Hello,
I am emailing to ask you to give $5 to my campaign against Lauren Boebert.
Here’s why: I am the Democratic nominee against Lauren Boebert, and a brand-new poll shows Boebert is still incredibly vulnerable!
In 2022, Adam Frisch nearly defeated Lauren Boebert. He lost by just 546 votes. That scared Lauren Boebert so much that she came running to my district.
But the voters of eastern Colorado don’t want a carpetbagging extremist more concerned with getting on Fox News than the needs of her constituents.
Even Republicans are done with Boebert: 57% voted for someone else in the primary!
We can finally kick Lauren Boebert out of Congress in November, but the only way I’ll be able to win is if we hit every fundraising goal and have the resources to fully fund my campaign.
We’ve set a goal of raising another $250,000 before our final end-of-month fundraising deadline, but right now, we’re still incredibly short.
So I have to ask: Please, if you can afford to, will you make a donation to my campaign – every dollar you can spare – to help me defeat Lauren Boebert?

clean_body: If your inbox is anything like mine, you are bombarded with emails telling you that the sky is falling and all hope is lost. You will never get that fake urgency from me. On the flip side, I also will never sugarcoat things. There *are* real needs that we have right now if we’re going to win. Real needs, because we are seeing our margin in public polls start to tighten, and our opponent is trumpeting that his campaign’s internal polls show a tied race. Real needs, because if we lose here in Michigan, Republicans will almost certainly take control of the U.S. Senate. Real needs, because voting has already begun here in Michigan and we are just 5 days out from Election Day. So I am concretely asking: will you split a donation of $5 between New Dems and my campaign for U.S. Senate in Michigan? subject: Real urgency
body: Team — If your inbox is anything like mine, you are bombarded with emailstelling you that the sky is falling and all hope is lost. You will never getthat fake urgency from me. On the flip side, I also will never sugarcoatthings. There *are* real needs that we have right now if we’re going to win.Real needs, because we are seeing our margin in public polls start to tighten,and our opponent is trumpeting that his campaign’s internal polls show a tiedrace. Real needs, because if we lose here in Michigan, Republicans will almostcertainly take control of the U.S. Senate. Real needs, because voting hasalready begun here in Michigan and we are just 5 days out from Election Day.So I am concretely asking: will you split a donation of $5 between New Demsand my campaign for U.S. Senate in Michigan? clean_body: Friend, I’ve waited my whole life to send you this email. The Democrats in power are TERRIFIED I’d reach out to you. They think they can shut us up & marginalize people like you & me. Hi, I’m Hung Cao. I’m a ret. Navy Captain who served in Special Forces for 25 years. I was a refugee from Vietnam in 1975 & my family, by the grace of God, came to America the right way—legally. My wife April & I have 5 beautiful kids that we homeschool. Look, my life’s story is not what the liberal media & Democrat mob claims conservatives should be. I represent EVERYTHING they hate the most. Biden and the Radical Dems have already announced $45 MILLION to destroy our GOP candidates. They’ll mock us & smear our records with lies & insults. That’s why I’m humbly asking for just a few bucks before my October deadline tonight at midnight: CHIP IN A FEW $$ TODAY → We’re out of time. I’m a veteran & not someone who normally asks for help, but everything rests on this. My candidacy is in your hands. If you’re going to give $5 or $10 this election – make it count, make it THIS race. I give you my word as a veteran & proud American, I will never, never let you down. DONATE TODAY → In Liberty, CAPT Hung Cao, USN (Ret) TEXT HUNG TO 21412 I came to America with little besides the clothes on my back. But with faith, dedication, and hard work, my family and I made it in America. I’m running for Senate to defend the American Dream that gave me everything. The Left is on a war path against the values that make us the greatest country on Earth. I didn’t put my life on the line defending those values in Special Operations in the Navy to let the Left destroy them. I know we can win this battle for our future, but I need your help. Can you chip in just $5 now to fuel our fight? We are fueled by grassroots patriots like you. Even just a dollar or two makes all the difference. Thank you for standing with us! JOINTEAM CAO! Paid for by Hung Cao for Virginia Use of military rank, job titles, and photographs in uniform does not imply endorsement by the Department of the Navy or the Department of Defense. clean_body: Time is running out We are coming down to the wire, and there are five conservative Senate candidates who need your support. Please make a split contribution to their campaigns now. Senate Conservatives Fund will pay all processing fees and transfer 100% of your contributions directly to their campaigns. Time is running out, so please take action now. All of these candidates can win if they have the funds to get their message out. ► Businessman Eric Hovde is running neck-and-neck with incumbent Senator Tammy Baldwin in Wisconsin. One poll conducted by the Trafalgar Group even showed Hovde leading by one point. Democrats have pulled their fire alarm and are pouring money into the state to save Baldwin. ► Businessman Bernie Moreno is on the verge of defeating incumbent Senator Sherrod Brown in Ohio, who has been a politician for over fifty years. Rasmussen Reports has Moreno up by one point, while the Washington Post has his down by one point. This is the best chance we've had to defeat Brown in years. ► Senator Ted Cruz is the Democrats' #1 target this year, and they are dumping millions of dollars into Texas to turn Texas Blue. His opponent, Rep. Colin Allred, is a Kamala Harris liberal who is desperately trying to hide his record. The Hill/Emerson College poll showed Cruz leading by only one point. ► Conservative former TV news anchor Kari Lake is surging in Arizona and only trails liberal Ruben Gallegos by four points. But apparently, she's too conservative for Mitch McConnell, who refuses to spend the party's money to support her. There's still time for her to win in a state where President Trump is expanding his lead. ► Army combat veteran Sam Brown is rapidly gaining on incumbent Senator Jacky Rosen in Nevada. Republicans are doing exceptionally well with early voting, and Brown only trails by three points, according to the latest Rasmussen Reports poll. ELECTION COUNTDOWN SUPPORT SENATE CONSERVATIVES DONATE NOW Change in Washington means changing the people we send there. Senate Conservatives Fund 300 Independence Ave SE Washington, DC 20003 Text SENATE to (877) 838-9388 to receive exclusive updates and invitations. Senate Conservatives Fund is a grassroots organization that promotes conservative policies and helps elect conservative candidates to the U.S. Senate. SCF was founded by former Senator Jim DeMint to help the grassroots change Washington. Contributions to the Senate Conservatives Fund are not deductible as charitable contributions. Contributions from corporations or foreign nationals lacking permanent resident status are not permitted. Federal law requires us to report the name, mailing address, occupation and employer for each individual whose contributions aggregate in excess of $200 in a calendar year. Not paid for at taxpayer expense. PAID FOR BY SENATE CONSERVATIVES FUND AND NOT AUTHORIZED BY ANY CANDIDATE OR CANDIDATE'S COMMITTEE. SENATECONSERVATIVES.COM Unsubscribe

Hey Peter, it’s Mark Hamill. **In a moment, I’m going to ask you to make a donation to Trisha Calvarese, the official Democratic nominee running against Lauren Boebert in Colorado.** But before I do, let me explain why right-wing extremists like Boebert scare me.
**Lauren Boebert isn’t just a national embarrassment – she has an actual vote in Congress.** Boebert is ready to pass a national abortion ban, gut Medicare and Social Security, and throw our veterans under the bus if she’s reelected again. _And don’t even get me started on Project 2025…_
The Force is strong with Trisha. That’s why I am so excited about Trisha’s campaign: **New polling shows that Trisha can win and defeat Lauren Boebert! But Trisha can only flip this seat blue if she is able to raise enough money and fully fund her campaign.** I’m ready to help Trisha Calvarese take on Lauren Boebert and finally kick her out of Congress, and I am asking you to join me today: **Please, will you make a donation right now to Trisha Calvarese’s campaign to help her defeat Lauren Boebert this November? clean_body: Like many people who care about the impact elections have on their lives, I amsure your inbox is filled with last-minute requests before the final end-of-month fundraising deadline of this election cycle.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-slotkin] I am invading your inboxas well, apologetically, asking for your help today.[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-slotkin] Would you be able to makea contribution to my Senate campaign and Tim Kaine before our end-of-monthfundraising deadline ends tonight? If you have been thinking about donatingtoour campaign, now would be the perfect time. You can use this secure linktodonate: secure.actblue/slotkin-end-octx31[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tk-2024-slotkin] The polls show that thisSenate race in Michigan is a dead heat, with a lot of voters still undecided.That’s who we need to get to. If we fall short of our goal before the deadlineends, it puts us at risk of not being able to reach those voters — especiallyin places outside of my current congressional district. I still need to talkto a lot of undecided people in Michigan, and that could be the differencebetween winning or losing. So please: Can you make one more contribution to mySenate campaign before the final end-of-month fundraising deadline? Friend,

I know you’re probably enjoying Halloween with your family, so I’ll get right to it.

Our FINAL end-of-month deadline is TONIGHT at MIDNIGHT, and right now we’re falling behind.

PITCH IN NOW 

Here’s the situation: the radical Left is spending over $10 MILLION against me in Michigan with baseless attacks and lies. This is our absolute LAST chance to get the resources we need to fight back before Election Day. We set the ambitious goal to raise $50,000 before TONIGHT at MIDNIGHT, but right now we’re falling short. If we miss our goal, we might have to make critical cuts that could cost us this race.

Can you rush a FINAL contribution before tonight at midnight so we can meet our goal? PITCH IN $10 PITCH IN $25 PITCH IN $50 PITCH IN $100 PITCH IN OTHER AMOUNT 

Thank you, John James

I have stoodstrong for our Arizona values and beliefs. The local and national Democratsrunning attacks ads against me continue to lie about my stellar legislativerecord. My opponent and her out-of-state union bosses have been running digital ads and TV commercials suggestingmy opponent suddenly cares about border security after voting against it overand over, again. Will you step up bychipping in before midnight to help us get out the vote and defeat extremistDerrick Van Orden? clean_body: Peter, Friday November 1st marks the 3rd day of early voting here in Oklahoma.So what are the three things you need to know? First of all, there just sohappen to be 3 judges of the Oklahoma Supreme Court on the ballot. And theyare ALL liberal. They are all THREE appointed by Democrat Governors. And wehave the chance to remove all three at once. If WE vote NO on all threeliberal Supreme Court judges, they will be removed and can no longer be ableto force their liberal agenda on Oklahoma. The question on your ballot will beif Edmonson, Gurich, & Kauger should be retained in their current positions.And the answer is NO, they should not be retained. All three must go, so wemust all VOTE NO! Secondly, you’ll be voting on several candidates beyond justthe President. We can all compare the economic boom with 4 years of PresidentTrump to the disastrous 4 years under Biden-Harris. If your mind isn’t alreadymade up on who to vote for as President think of how much better off you were4 years ago & realize we can have that again. There are other candidates onthe ballot, so the easiest way to vote is to choose “Republican” straightparty voting. That’ll make your selection for all those races & help put inRepublicans at the State & local level to help restore our economy & keep moremoney in your pockets. And third, you’ll also have two State Questions on yourballot. SQ833 creates new tax structures. Many people are torn on how to votefor this, but we’ll just put out there that we don’t believe the governmentneeds MORE ways to tax us. If you agree we don’t need more tax options, you’llvote no on this one. As for SQ834 it would clarify that ONLY citizens can votein Oklahoma elections. It’s obvious part of the Biden-Harris open border planis to get more people voting, including non-citizens. In fact a dozen citiesalready allow non-citizens to vote INCLUDING Washington DC! We must secure ourelections by allowing ONLY citizens to vote. Otherwise liberal court judges(refer to the first item listed above!) will allow law-breaking foreigners tovote in our elections. So there you have it, the three things you needtoknow. 1) Vote no on all THREE Supreme Court judges. 2) Vote Republicanstraight party. 3) On the State Questions vote for lower taxes & ONLY citizensvoting. -Team OKGOP -=-=- Paid for by OKGOP and not authorized by anycandidate or candidate's committee. www.OKGOP.com - (405) 528-3501. 4031 N.Linconln Blvd., Oklahoma City, OK 73105 This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com. To stop receiving emails:https://okgop.nationbuilder.com/unsubscribe -=-=- Created with NationBuilder -https://nationbuilder.com/

And third, you’ll also have two State Questions on yourballot. SQ833 creates new tax structures. Many people are torn on how to votefor this, but we’ll just put out there that we don’t believe the governmentneeds MORE ways to tax us. If you agree we don’t need more tax options, you’llvote no on this one. As for SQ834 it would clarify that ONLY citizens can votein Oklahoma elections. It’s obvious part of the Biden-Harris open border planis to get more people voting, including non-citizens. In fact a dozen citiesalready allow non-citizens to vote INCLUDING Washington DC! We must secure ourelections by allowing ONLY citizens to vote. Otherwise liberal court judges(refer to the first item listed above!) will allow law-breaking foreigners tovote in our elections. So there you have it, the three things you need toknow. 1) Vote no on all THREE Supreme Court judges. 2) Vote Republicanstraight party. 3) On the State Questions vote for lower taxes & ONLY citizensvoting. -Team OKGOP -=-=- Paid for by OKGOP and not authorized by anycandidate or candidate's committee. www.OKGOP.com - (405) 528-3501. 4031 N.Linconln Blvd., Oklahoma City, OK 73105 This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com. To stop receiving emails:https://okgop.nationbuilder.com/unsubscribe -=-=- Created with NationBuilder -https://nationbuilder.com/

I can’t wait to keep fighting for you and your communities in the Senate if you give me the opportunity. But friend, I need your support – large or small, it doesn’t matter – if I’m going to win my re-election campaign in November. clean_body: Peter – the ghosts and monsters outside aren’t the only scary part of this Halloween. The stakes of this election aren’t nothing less than spooky. To protect our rights this Halloween, can you donate today? Donate Now →[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/em_yc_q4_2024?refcode=email_103124_trick-or-treat] My opponent is all tricks and no treat : * He has supported a total abortion ban with no exceptions for rape or incest, even calling overturning Roe v. Wade a “success”. * He voted against expanding Title X funding, which provides essential reproductive healthcare like ultrasounds and affordable contraception. * He voted against lowering insurance premiums and prescription costs, capping the price of life-saving medication, and cutting hospital fees.* In Congress, he would have the power to enact this dangerous agenda on a national level. In contrast, I’m dedicated to building a future that protects abortion rights, lowers costs for families, and provides affordable healthcare for everyone. To create that future and fight back against my opponent’s scary agenda, I need your help. Can you donate today to help us meet our end-of-month goal this Halloween? clean_body: This isn’t what you want to see, Peter. Another public polljust released shows Bob behind David McCormick. It’s the second one in twoweeks with us trailing. That’s the first time we’ve seen two back-to-backpolls with us down. You probably didn’t wake up this morning thinking “Gee,I’m going to donate to Bob Casey.” But with only 5 days left, we’re asking ifyou can chip in before it’s too late. Pennsylvania will come down to just ahandful of votes. We made you a personal link so we can thank everyone whodonates: [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/casey-em-20241031-8?refcode=em20241031-8&refcode2;=4743_552475_OvvHpE&akid;=4743%2E552475%2EOvvHpE]https://secure.actblue.com/donate/casey-em-20241031-8?refcode=em20241031-8-dpwillis67@gmail.com We always knew thisrace would come down to the wire. OnTuesday, control of the U.S. Senate and the White House will be decided right herein Pennsylvania. Can we count on your help one last time? Please, use thispersonalized link to contribute now: [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/casey-em-20241031-8?refcode=em20241031-8&refcode2;=4743_552475_OvvHpE&akid;=4743%2E552475%2EOvvHpE]https://secure.actblue.com/donate/casey-em-20241031-8?refcode=em20241031-8-dpwillis67@gmail.com With polls this close,it’s no exaggeration to say your donation could be the difference betweenvictory and defeat. clean_body: Hi there, it’s President Bill Clinton. I’ve been traveling around the countryleading up to November 5th, and I’ve been so excited to see all the youngleaders coming up. They are the future of this country. One race I have beenwatching closely is here in California’s 45th district. Folks, Derek Tran hasa real chance to flip this seat and deliver the House for the Democrats, buthe is up against the fundraising arm of the Republican party. With just 5 daysleft, Derek needs the support of folks like you to flip this seat from red-to-blue and restore the Democratic Majority. Will you join me in helping to getDerek across the finish line? >>>https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tran_email_q42024?amount=25&refcode;=em_fr_2024.10.31_b3_bcDerek embodies the American Dream. His story would be improbable anywhereelse. Derek enlisted in the Army, serving the country that had given hisparents refuge from the communist regime in Vietnam. He put himself throughschool and now works every day to stand up to bad actors as a consumer rightsattorney. Now he is running for Congress to be the first VietnameseCongressman to represent Little Saigon in the House of Representatives. Afterthe extremism and division we have seen in recent years, we need to go forwardtogether – and that means electing folks like Derek Tran who will stand up forthe values we all believe in. Will you help me support Derek as he takes onthe brunt of the Republican fundraising arm and works to flip this criticalseat? These final 5 days are all we have, so I hope you’ll join us.>>>https://secure.actblue.com/donate/tran_email_q42024?amount=25&refcode;=em_fr_2024.10.31_b3_bcThank you for doing your part, Bill Clinton Bill Clinton 42nd President of theUnited States ------------- Paid for by Derek Tran for Congress P.O. With this final end-of-month deadline just hours away, I am reaching out one last time. My team just showed me we are still coming up $3,384 short on our fundraising goal. Peter, this close to the election, we cannot afford to miss any fundraising goals, especially with so much on the line. We are seeing the clock turn backwards on women’s reproductive freedoms, failure to address the threat of gun violence, and attacks on education. I'm running for re-election so I can continue championing for the issues you care about the most. This hardworking community deserves someone who works just as hard for them, and I'm ready to keep doing exactly that. Peter, can I please count on you to chip in so we can win for everyone in Northeast Ohio? https://secure.actblue.com/donate/sykesq42024?&amount;=10&refcode;=em_rs_2024.10.31_b3_es_all Let’s win together, Emilia Sykes 
-------------------- 
A native of Akron, Ohio, Emilia Sykes has deep roots fighting for Ohioans. She learned from a young age how to use her voice and the power of the people to create change. In 2022, Congresswoman Sykes was elected to represent Ohio’s newly redrawn 13th Congressional District, winning one of the toughest races in the country. Emilia has cut through the divisiveness to deliver results. Paid for by Emilia Sykes for Congress Emilia Sykes for Congress PO Box 1347 Akron, OH 44309 United States

committee: Paid for by Nella for Senate
clean_body: I am ready to get to work on DAY ONE with Pres. Trump to secure our borders and fix what the left has broken. Friend, I was just boots on the ground at the border in New Mexico, once again assessing the situation and reminding voters justhow bad Kamala Harris and Martin Heinrich have allowed it to become. Of course, “bad” is the understatement of the century. Words and phrases like “horrifying,” “deadly,” and “worst in history” get closer to appropriate descriptions of what has happened under their watch. And it’s not like they just allowed it to happen – they curated this disaster! There’s NO WAY we can allow Harris or Heinrich to continue failing us in Washington, D.C., and I need your help to defeat them and their radical agenda here in New Mexico. I am ready to get to work on DAY ONE with Pres. Trump to secure our borders and fix what the left has broken. We’re so close to the finish line, and I need your help to get across. Please rush $10 or more to help us keep fighting every minute all the way until the end, when we’ve flipped this seat, secured the Senate, and ensured we have the ability to get our country back on track. Thank you, Nella Domenici Help Elect Nella and Secure the Border » ABOUT NELLA New Mexico is Nella Domenici’s home. She was born in Albuquerque and lived for most of her childhood in a home near the intersection of Lomas and Monroe with her seven siblings, and her parents - Pete and Nancy Domenici. Nella began her education at Our Lady of Fatima, where she learned the values she holds today. Nella is a proud third-generation New Mexican, devoted mother of two, step-mom of four, and the wife of a Navy Veteran. Nella’s family’s roots run deep in New Mexico and she and her husband Pat enjoy their family home in New Mexico that they have owned for nearly twenty years. Like most New Mexicans, Nella Domenici understands the importance of hard work. She waited tables to help pay for her undergraduate degree from Georgetown University, and worked her way through night school at Georgetown Law while holding down a full time job. She then graduated from Harvard Business School as a Baker Scholar, top 5% of the class, while 9 months pregnant. Nella began her career at the bottom and worked her way up through the complex finance world, eventually serving as CFO for one of the world’s largest, most successful investment firms. In her career, Nella advised, invested in, grew, and led many companies, and served on public company boards. The industries she has worked in are vast and include areas such as health care, AI, food service, lodging, commercial real estate, mortgage lending, and consumer products. These companies have ranged from small family-owned businesses, to rapidly growing venture backed enterprises, to a Fortune 200 company. Several of these have been headquartered in New Mexico. Collectively, the companies Nella has been heavily involved with have employed thousands of Americans. Like her father and mother, Nella has been a warrior for those who most need an advocate: for women competing in academics or business, for families dealing with mental illness, and for those without access to quality healthcare or education. JOIN NELLA Follow Nella Online Checks can be made payable to Nella for Senate and mailed to PO Box 92918 | Albuquerque, NM 87199 Paid for by Nella for Senate Don't want to receive any more of our emails? We hate to see you go: unsubscribe .

clean_body:
Fellow Patriot,

We are just DAYS AWAY from the final end-of-month deadline ofthe election. This is the last email I’ll send you on the matter.

We’re stillshort of where we need to be, and we can’t miss our goal. This is the mostIMPORTANT Senate race in the country, so I don’t want you to sit on thesidelines. Can you pitch in a few dollars or whatever you can right now? RUSHA CONTRIBUTION The consequences of falling short could be DEVASTATING for ourmovement. This race is going to be close, and your contribution could be theone that pushes us over the edge to victory. But if we don’t have theresources we need to fight back against the establishment, we could lose thisrace and hand over six more years to career politician Tim Kaine. Ourgrassroots team is one of the strongest in the country, and I know that if weall do our part, we CAN flip Virginia RED!! But I need your help, and I needit ASAP. Can you pitch in $5, $25, $100, or whatever you can before MIDNIGHTTONIGHT so we can meet our CRITICAL end-of-month goal? SAVE OUR COUNTRYEverything we’ve worked so hard for comes down to this. I hope I can counton your support. In Liberty,
CAPT Hung Cao USN (Ret)

Paid for by Hung Cao for Virginia

clean_body: Here we go, Peter. Election Day is just five days away, and I wanted to take the opportunity to thank each and every one of our dedicated grassroots supporters. Without folks like you, we wouldn’t be in a strong position to defend IL-17 and defeat my radical opponent Joe McGraw. I truly appreciate your steadfast support. But we can’t take anything for granted. This race will be razor-close, and it could determine control of the House for the next two years. These last few days are vital for our efforts to get out the vote on Tuesday. Right now, we’re $2,721 short of our October goal, but with a few more supporters chipping in, we can get there by midnight. Please consider contributing today. Here's a good link: **https://secure.actblue.com/donate/es-q4-2024** For candidates like me who don’t rely on big special interests, grassroots support is essential. And thanks to folks like you, my campaign has been able to compete with millions of dollars from our opponent’s super PAC allies. But here’s the blunt truth: If IL-17 flips red, chances are that Congress will flip red, too. A Republican-led House would be devastating for reproductive freedom, the middle class, and, frankly, the future of American democracy. Help us make a strong final push and continue the momentum you’ve helped us build. Let’s keep IL-17 blue. Here’s the link once more: **https://secure.actblue.com/donate/es-q4-2024** Thank you — and Happy Halloween! Now let’s go win this election. -Eric ---

clean_body: In just a moment, I’ll ask you to [https://act.adamschiff.com/go/62?t=1001&akid;=8115%2E5257348%2EsXIrGH] Adam Schiff for Senate Derek — In just a moment, I’ll ask you to [https://act.adamschiff.com/go/1014?c0=oct2024_abs_em.0Y0BaT&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_EOM_AC90_20241031_PM2_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=5&t;=1004&akid;=8115%2E5257348%2EsXIrGH] chip in $5 ahead of tonight’s end-of-month deadline. But first, I want to update you on everything that’s been happening. We’re only 5 days away from the election, and attacks from MAGA Republicans are non-stop — especially Donald Trump. Whenever Trump gets near a microphone, it’s almost a given that he’s going to attack me. At a MAGA rally in California, Trump threatened to withhold federal assistance for wildfires, attacked me personally, and urged his supporters to back GOP candidates across California. On Fox News, Trump rolled out a dangerous new attack, calling me the “enemy within,” claiming that I’m even more dangerous than foreign adversaries. He even threatened to use the military against me for holding him accountable. His goal is simple, Derek: sabotage my campaign and silence anyone standing in his way. It’s clear Trump and his allies still see me as a threat — and the closer we get to Election Day, the worse and more frequent the attacks will become. I don’t take a dime from corporate PACs, so it will take a movement of grassroots supporters to overcome Trump and his allies’ attacks. name: Adam Schiff
subject: It’s only going to get more intense from here
body: [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/62?t=1001&akid;=8115%2E5257348%2EsXIrGH ]Adam Schiff for Senate Derek — In just a moment, I’ll ask you to [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/1014?c0=oct2024_abs_em.0Y0BaT&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_EOM_AC90_20241031_PM2_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=5&t;=1004&akid;=8115%2E5257348%2EsXIrGH ]chip in $5 ahead of tonight’s end-of-month deadline. But first, I want to update you on everything that’s been happening. We’re only 5 days away from the election, and attacks from MAGA Republicans are non-stop — especially Donald Trump. Whenever Trump gets near a microphone, it’s almost a given that he’s going to attack me. At a MAGA rally in California, Trump threatened to withhold federal assistance for wildfires, attacked me personally, and urged his supporters to back GOP candidates across California. On Fox News, Trump rolled out a dangerous new attack, calling me the “enemy within,” claiming that I’m even more dangerous than foreign adversaries. He even threatened to use the military against me for holding him accountable. His goal is simple, Derek: sabotage my campaign and silence anyone standing in his way. It’s clear Trump and his allies still see me as a threat — and the closer we get to Election Day, the worse and more frequent the attacks will become. I don’t take a dime from corporate PACs, so it will take a movement of grassroots supporters to overcome Trump and his allies’ attacks. [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/1014?c0=oct2024_abs_em.0Y0BaT&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_EOM_AC90_20241031_PM2_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=5&t;=1005&akid;=8115%2E5257348%2EsXIrGH ]Can I count on you to chip in $5 or more before tonight’s end-of-month deadline to power our campaign through this final stretch? committee: Paid for by Friends of Dave McCormick
clean_body: At West Point, we had a code: cadets don't lie, cheat, steal, or tolerate those who do. First the New York Times lied about my childhood and family, and now CNN is lying about my business record. And what’s worse, they are doing it all because I’m within striking distance of an entrenched career politician, Bob Casey, in the #1 swing state in the nation that will determine control of the U.S Senate. Bob Casey is getting Leftist news sources to do his dirty work, and I WON’T TOLERATE IT. Here's the truth: this is a long message and I hope you will read all the way to the end. I grew up in Bloomsburg, Pennsylvania. We lived on campus at Bloomsburg State College and my parents owned a farm ten minutes down the road. I had summer jobs baling hay and trimming Christmas trees at nearby farms. My dad started his career teaching history, economics, & democracy at Punxsutawney High. My mom began teaching fourth through sixth graders at a public school near Pittsburgh. I’m incredibly proud that my dad was chosen to be president of Bloomsburg State College (now Bloomsburg University) at only 34 years old. I’m so proud of my parents’ teaching careers and to have been raised in Bloomsburg. It was there that I wrestled and played football and was nominated to the U.S. Military Academy at West Point. And it was there that I came home to a parade after serving in combat during the Gulf War. After the Army, I earned a Ph.D. in international relations before moving to Pittsburgh to start a career in business. I worked my way up to become the CEO of FreeMarkets, a successful tech startup that employed hundreds in Western Pennsylvania. I was then called to service again, this time in the highest levels of government as Under Secretary of Treasury and as Deputy National Security Advisor. Following this, I joined Bridgewater Associates, one of the largest, most successful investment firms in the world, which manages the pension plans of groups including teachers, firefighters and law enforcement. I have lived the American Dream, and I am running for Senate to bring my decades of experience and love for our country to fix our broken economy that is a direct result of policies supported by my opponent, who has spent 18 years in Washington with NOTHING to show for it. I knew getting into this race could mean things would get nasty, but it’s sad to see we’ve fallen so far that these media outlets like the New York Times and CNN are pushing the Democrats’ baked narrative about my upbringing and my business record. I’ve opened myself and my family up to attacks from the left, and every day feels like a battle. But I’m no stranger to fighting for what is right and if we don’t elect leaders to go to DC to clean up the mess the career politicians made, we will lose America as we know it! Here’s where I need your help, Fellow Patriot. We need to combat these lies with the TRUTH about me. The Democrats are seeing the same polls you and I see. They know if Kamala Harris and Bob Casey lose Pennsylvania, they lose it ALL, and they are going to do WHATEVER IT TAKES to try and defeat me. I hate asking for money — I’m not a career politician, and it’s not in my nature — but I have no choice but to ask if we’re going to hit our fundraising goal for the final stretch of the campaign. Will you chip in $30 or more right now to fight back against the lies from the Left? Chuck Schumer and his allies are working overtime to obliterate my campaign. They have committed to spend whatever it takes to defeat me.They know if I win this race in Pennsylvania, it’ll be IMPOSSIBLE for Democrats to keep their majority in the Senate. If we don’t show the Democrats we can win this race, it’s game over. That’s why I’m hoping you can spare $29, $50, or even $100 to help me fight back against the lies. DONATE Your donation will take us one step closer to victory, and I am so grateful for your support. Thank you, Dave McCormick P.S. Democrats from all over the country are pouring money into this race to defeat me because they know this race could flip the Senate red. Will you chip in $29 or more to make sure I have the resources to WIN? DONATE Paid for by Friends of Dave McCormick. Our mailing address is: PO BOX 23537 PITTSBURGH, PA 15222 Privacy Policy Unsubscribe

clean_body: We’re on the cusp of flipping New Mexico red and electing new leadership that will secure our border, lower our cost of living, get tough on crime, improve education, and unleash our abundant natural resources. I’m fired up, Peter! The energy at President Trump’s rally in Albuquerque today was palpable. I could feel it on stage while delivering my own remarks, and it was apparent to anyone who was there todaythat something special is happening in New Mexico. We’re on the cusp of flipping this state red and electing new leadership that will secure our border, lower our cost of living, get tough on crime, improve education, and unleash our abundant natural resources. I need you to keep fighting every single day, every single moment, until the polls close on Tuesday. Our campaign is working 24/7 to reach remaining undecided voters and get out the vote. We need to keep resources flowing into this campaign to ensure our funding for these operations doesn’t run dry. Your $5 or $10 contribution, in addition to your vote, is needed to help us secure more votes. Please chip in anything you can, and let’s win this thing! Let's Flip New Mexico RED! Thank you, Nella Domenici ABOUT NELLA New Mexico is Nella Domenici’s home. She was born in Albuquerque and lived for most of her childhood in a home near the intersection of Lomas and Monroe with her seven siblings, and her parents - Pete and Nancy Domenici. Nella began her education at Our Lady of Fatima, where she learned the values she holds today. Nella is a proud third-generation New Mexican, devoted mother of two, step-mom of four, and the wife of a Navy Veteran. Nella’s family’s roots run deep in New Mexico and she and her husband Pat enjoy their family home in New Mexico that they have owned for nearly twenty years. Like most New Mexicans, Nella Domenici understands the importance of hard work. She waited tables to help pay for her undergraduate degree from Georgetown University, and worked her way through night school at Georgetown Law while holding down a full time job. She then graduated from Harvard Business School as a Baker Scholar, top 5% of the class, while 9 months pregnant. Nella began her career at the bottom and worked her way up through the complex finance world, eventually serving as CFO for one of the world’s largest, most successful investment firms. In her career, Nella advised, invested in, grew, and led many companies, and served on public company boards. The industries she has worked in are vast and include areas such as health care, AI, food service, lodging, commercial real estate, mortgage lending, and consumer products. These companies have ranged from small family-owned businesses, to rapidly growing venture backed enterprises, to a Fortune 200 company. Several of these have been headquartered in New Mexico. Collectively, the companies Nella has been heavily involved with have employed thousands of Americans. Like her father and mother, Nella has been a warrior for those who most need an advocate: for women competing in academics or business, for families dealing with mental illness, and for those without access to quality healthcare or education. JOIN NELLA Follow Nella Online Checks can be made payable to Nella for Senate and mailed to PO Box 92918 | Albuquerque, NM 87199 Paid for by Nella for Senate Don't want to receive any more of our emails? We hate to see you go: unsubscribe .

clean_body: Tim Sheehy for Montana Mistakes happen when we lose sight of our goals. We need to make up ground today. Fellow Conservative - Things have gone from bad to worse. A new poll has me TIED with Tester less than a week from Election Days. Help us fight back right now. Please, chip in whatever you can while we still have time to secure the Senate majority and save this country. For America's Futrue, Tim Sheehy “ "I SERVED AS A NAVY SEAL, BUILT ONE OF THE LARGEST AERIAL FIREFIGHTING COMPANIES IN AMERICA CREATING OVER 200 MONTANA JOBS, AND STARTED A VETERAN-LED CATTLE RANCHING AND FEEDING OPERATION. WHETHER IT WAS IN WAR OR BUSINESS, I SEE PROBLEMS AND SOLVE THEM. AMERICA NEEDS CONSERVATIVE LEADERS WHO LOVE OUR COUNTRY. I'M RUNNING FOR THE U.S. SENATE BECAUSE OUR CAMPAIGN IS ABOUT SERVICE, DUTY, AND COUNTRY — NOT POLITICS AS USUAL."

Kamala Harris
https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/jr4harris?refcode2=khp_em_20241031_b1_kdh_jr_fl&refcode;=jtk4860-bu-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 $5. That’s the donation I am asking you to splitbetween my campaign and Jacky Rosen’s campaign. I’ll explain more, but if thatis all you need to hear, you can make a donation at this link below:
https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/jr4harris?refcode2=khp_em_20241031_b1_kdh_jr_fl&refcode;=jtk4860-bu-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 In 5 days, Nevada will decide who they wantas their next U.S. senator and their next president. Ultimately, this election isabout two different visions for our nation. One focused on the future. And onefocused on the past. Jacky Rosen and I believe in a future where every personhas the opportunity not just to get by, but to get ahead. Where no child hasto grow up in poverty. Where every worker has the freedom to join a union.Where every person has affordable health care, child care, and paid leave.Where every senior can retire with dignity. But Donald Trump and his extremistRepublican allies want to take our country backward. They intend to cut SocialSecurity and Medicare, to give tax breaks to billionaires and big corporationsand to make working families foot the bill, and end the Affordable Care Act.America has tried these failed policies before. We are not going back.Generations of Americans before us led the fight for freedom. Now, the batonis in our hands. To protect the right to vote. To get assault weapons off ofour streets. To restore reproductive freedom, reversing Donald Trump's extremeabortion bans. Jacky Rosen is running for reelection to continue deliveringfor Nevadans. In the Senate, she has never hesitated to take on powerfulspecial interests to bring down costs for hardworking Nevada families. If youare ready to join us in the fight for freedom and opportunity for all, pleasesplit a donation of $5 to our campaigns. Because when we fight, we win.

Schumerhas said they will spend over one-hundred million dollars to defeat me. clean_body: Derek, You might ask yourself if chipping in $5 actually makes a difference to a political campaign. Before I ran for office, I asked myself that same question. The answer is absolutely, yes! Here’s exactly what $5 can buy a campaign to reach voters: * 250 digital ad impressions * 8 pieces of mail * 10 doors canvassed (you can increase this number by volunteering!) In many close races, voter turnout will determine the final outcome. Campaigns are in high-gear trying to get as many supporters as they can to the polls. Voter contact efforts, made possible by your $5 donation, remind people what’s at stake and how important it is for them to make their voices heard. The House majority could be determined by just a few competitive races here in California, which is why I’m doing everything I can to help folks like Dave Min, Will Rollins, and Derek Tran win—from financial resources to supporting their Get Out The Vote events. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ttp-em-20241031-2?refcode=em20241031-39247&amounts;=5,20,50,100,250,500,1000&refcode2=%3D39247_3422442_DKYwzx&akid=%3D39247.3422442.DKYwzx] November 5th is going to be a pivotal election. Can you chip in $5 or more to Truth to Power to help get our slate of endorsed candidates across the finish line? [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ttp-em-20241031-2?refcode=em20241031-39247&refcode2=%3D39247_3422442_DKYwzx&akid=%3D39247.3422442.DKYwzx] Donate $5 Every single $5 donation adds up and makes a big difference for our work and the campaigns we support. Thank you, Katie Contribute to Truth to Power: [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/truth-to-power-1?refcode=em&t=%3D1002&refcode2=%3D39247_3422442_DKYwzx&akid=%3D39247.3422442.DKYwzx] This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. Vote Ryan Mackenzie
Dear Friend,
We are 5 days away from bringing real changeto Congress, America, and the Greater Lehigh Valley. But to make sure we getthere, we still need your help. Join Ryan and Congressman Tom Emmer(Republican Whip) this Saturday at 10:00 AM as we make sure our voters getto the polls on Election Day. Coffee and donuts will be provided.
Please RSVP toSara Baran at sara@mackenzieforcongress.com (mailto:sara@mackenzieforcongress.com) or on the RSVP BUTTON below.

Saturday,11/2: 10:00 AM Door-To-Door & Phone Banking Mackenzie Campaign HQ 1125 S.Cedar Crest Blvd. Allentown, PA (Bottom floor)
Sunday, 11/3: 2:00 PM Door-To-Door & Phone Banking Northampton County Republican Committee 2523 Willow ParkRd. Bethlehem, PA 
Election Day Poll Greeters
If you have not signed up to helpon Election Day, we still need volunteers to greet voters at the polls andmake a final pitch for Ryan. Please contact Sara Baran atSara@mackenzieforcongress.com (mailto:Sara@MackenzieForCongress.com) or call(484) 575-1872 with your town and phone number and we will contact you toassign you to a polling location.

Any timeyou can give will help us defeat Susan Wild and bring the change we need toCongress!
Please join us this weekend.
https://facebook.com/Mackenzieforcongress https://x.com/Ryan_Mackenzie

clean_body: With just hours left before our final end-of-month fundraising deadline of this campaign, and victory on the horizon, I’m asking you one last time for your support: Can I count on you to be one of just 60 Democrats to chip in $7 to our campaign? Every dollar down the final stretch makes a difference in our ability to reach the 700,000 residents of my district, Peter! »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mc_takano_q42024_df?amount=7] The MAGA movement we’re up against wants to fully implement their dangerous agenda and steamroll all of our Democratic progress by: ❌ Banning abortion nationwide and making the government decide if women receive healthcare or not… ❌ Prosecute, imprison, and execute Donald Trump’s political opponents… ❌ Enforce the Alien Enemies Act of 1798, the very same law that forced my Japanese-American grandparents into internment camps during World War II. Peter, it’s easy to let our nerves get the better of us with just 5 days left in this election. I’ve looked at the polling data and the fundamentals and we’re in the driver's seat. But we can’t stop fighting. We’re on track to win, but your support today will make that win a near-guarantee! That's the amount Arizona Senator Mark Kelly won hisSenateseat by in 2020. 0.3%. That's Joe Biden's margin of victory over DonaldTrumpin Arizona in 2020. 0.67%. That's the amount Kari Lake lost by in 2022 in theArizona gubernatorial race. $150 million. That's how much money is being spenton political TV ads during this campaign cycle in Arizona. The bottom line?Arizona is a state where elections are won by the narrowest of margins,andwith millions being spent against Ruben, this race will likely be nodifferent. clean_body: It's not just the race for the White House that hinges on Arizona. Two of the most important congressional races in the nation are happening right here in our state. Next door to our district in AZ-01, Dr. Amish Shah has the chance to finally beat David Schweikert and flip a critical battleground seat blue. Schweikert is a MAGA die-hard who helped write the Trump tax cuts, which gave billionaires and big corporations a $1.9 trillion tax break. He's also an anti-choice fanatic who once said that women who have abortions 'hate our country.' And in AZ-06, Kirsten Engel is running to flip a seat that went red by just 5,232 votes in 2022. Friend,

in a few hours, we’re facing our LAST and most important fundraising deadline of the election. I am humbly asking for your help to hit our goal and defeat our MAGA opponent:
[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/salinas-q42024?refcode=email_103124_stakes] Donate → [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/salinas-q42024?refcode=email_103124_stakes]

With all that’s at stake this election, I don’t want to wake up on November 6th wishing we had done more, and I’m sure you don’t either. Reinstating abortion rights nationwide, protecting the Affordable Care Act, and defending democracy are all on the ballot in OR-06.

Our opponent thinks he can buy this race by writing his campaign a giant check and using it to fund attack ads against me. This is our chance to prove him wrong — and to flip the House blue — but it’s going to take one more big push.

Here’s a secure link to donate via ActBlue:
https://secure.actblue.com/donate/salinas-q42024?refcode=email_103124_stakes[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/salinas-q42024?refcode=email_103124_stakes]

Thanks for your support,
Andrea

clean_body: Hey Peter,it’s Alison, asking you bluntly: Can you make a donation of $25 or any amountto support Emily Randall for Congress before our midnight deadline?Yes, I’mreaching out to you on behalf of my wife, my partner of 18 years, the person Iknow and trust to serve our district. I’m also reaching out as a union member,asking you to support the endorsed candidate of hundreds of thousands ofworking people across the state — myself included! And, I’m reaching out assomeone who wants a Congress full of people who know what it’s like to paytheir own bills, struggle with student loans, care for loved ones, andnavigate health insurance. Let’s be real: It’s not easy for candidates withworking-class backgrounds to win elections. That’s why more than half ofCongressmembers are millionaires! The only way people like Emily win is byorganizing thousands of people like you and me to make grassroots donations of$25, $50 or whatever amount makes sense for them. That’s why I’m asking: Canyou bring a little change to the world and contribute any amount beforemidnight to elect Emily?We reallyappreciate you. — Alison DONATEVOLUNTEERMEET EMILY ENDORSE EMILYPaid for by Emily Randall for Congress Emily Randall for Congress P.O. name: Alison, Emily Randall for Congress
subject: It’s not easy for candidates with working-class backgrounds to win elections
body: http://secure.actblue.com/donate/rs_er4c2024_fr_q42024?amount=[http://secure.actblue.com/donate/rs_er4c2024_fr_q42024?amount=] Hey Peter,it’s Alison, asking you bluntly: Can you make a donation of $25 or any amountto support Emily Randall for Congress before our midnight deadline?[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/rs_er4c2024_fr_q42024?amount=] Yes, I’mreaching out to you on behalf of my wife, my partner of 18 years, the person Iknow and trust to serve our district. I’m also reaching out as a union member,asking you to support the endorsed candidate of hundreds of thousands ofworking people across the state — myself included! And, I’m reaching out assomeone who wants a Congress full of people who know what it’s like to paytheir own bills, struggle with student loans, care for loved ones, andnavigate health insurance. Let’s be real: It’s not easy for candidates withworking-class backgrounds to win elections. That’s why more than half ofCongressmembers are millionaires! The only way people like Emily win is byorganizing thousands of people like you and me to make grassroots donations of$25, $50 or whatever amount makes sense for them. That’s why I’m asking: Canyou bring a little change to the world and contribute any amount beforemidnight to elect Emily?[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/rs_er4c2024_fr_q42024?amount=] We reallyappreciate you. — Alison DONATE[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/rs_er4c2024_fr_q42024] VOLUNTEER[https://secure.ngpvan.com/f9RInQxnI0m8DKkG4SKlvA2?contactdata=yR23NC7LR2m5oJZle4vQrSQ9zOrbQrDFylunS9FxPX886GBWATkL/DFOvz4rnLxvih+Sq5Ya6mKX13rO4lQRfQ==]MEET EMILY [https://electemilyrandall.com/about/] ENDORSE EMILY[http://secure.ngpvan.com/AcrzbNYvxE2LaGOyzGyeZg2?contactdata=yR23NC7LR2m5oJZle4vQrSQ9zOrbQrDFylunS9FxPX886GBWATkL/DFOvz4rnLxvih+Sq5Ya6mKX13rO4lQRfQ==]Paid for by Emily Randall for Congress Emily Randall for Congress P.O. clean_body: Before our final end-of-month deadline before Election Day passes in 4 hours, I’m counting on you to pitch in $3 to our $20,000 goal. Here’s why:$20,000 OCTOBER GOAL: DONATE $3 TO RE-ELECT RITCHIE » I don't come from a wealthy family with political connections and donors on speed dial. I don’t do a second of call-time. That way, I’m only beholden to people like you, Peter. I spend my time working on the issues that matter to my constituents, like making housing safe and affordable, expanding access to quality healthcare, and ensuring everyone – no matter who they are or where they came from – can make their voice heard. But that means we have to work even harder to fuel this people-powered movement. We don’t have the luxury to lose a single seat in the House, so I need your help, Peter. Can you rush $3 right now to help me reach our $20,000 October goal, save this seat, and take back the House in 5 days? If you’ve saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately: CONTRIBUTE $3 » The future of the Democratic Party rests on Ritchie Torres. Raised by a single mother in public housing, Ritchie personally understands the hardships that working families endure. At age 25, Ritchie made history as the youngest elected official to serve on the New York City Council. He fought tirelessly for the working families of The Bronx and now, he’s fighting for those families and for progressive values in Congress. He is the first openly gay Afro Latino ever elected to Congress. Ritchie is a champion for progressive policies to fight poverty and to improve the lives of families just like the one he was raised in. Thank you, Ritchie ---------------------------------------- Paid for by TorresFor Congress PO Box 580303, Bronx, NY 10458 www.torres.nyc Ritchie Torres represents the future of the Democratic Party. Raised by a single mother in public housing, Ritchie personally understands the hardships that working families endure. At age 25, Ritchie made history as the youngest elected official to serve on the New York City Council. He fought tirelessly for the working families of The Bronx and now, he’s fighting for those families and for progressive values in Congress. He is the first openly gay Afro Latino ever elected to Congress. Ritchie is a champion for progressive policies to fight poverty and to improve the lives of families just like the one he was raised in.

committee: Laura's campaign doesn't take a dime from corporate PACs and completely relies on grassroots supporters like you!
clean_body: After a year of campaigning – knocking doors, making phone calls, and building a movement for progress in CA-30 – this is our very last end-of-month email of the entire election cycle. There aren’t words to describe how grateful I am for your help. Our campaign was always for the people, by the people. We took a risk and relied on grassroots supporters like you to fund our efforts. No matter what happens next week, know that your support made a difference in elevating and empowering the voices of our community, and I am very grateful. With Election Day just 5 days away, this is our last chance to make sure we do everything we can; not just to win, but to get as many people as possible out to vote. My team just told me we are only $5,200 short of our final goal. This gap is a little larger than we expected, but I know this team always steps up when it matters most. That’s why I’m reaching out to you personally, friend. Can you chip in $3 or whatever you’re able to give right now to make these final days count? Every donation, no matter the size, will help us close the gap. Here’s your personal link to donate: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/lf-q4-2024?refcode=dpwillis67@gmail.com Anything you can give will help keep our momentum going strong in the final stretch. If you can, please pitch in before midnight. Here's that link again: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/lf-q4-2024?refcode=dpwillis67@gmail.com Let’s show them what we’re made of. Laura

Polls are currently flipping back and forth between me and my opponent. At this point, our race is a total tossup. Every dollar we raise helps us reach more undecided voters, and in a race that will come down to just a handful of votes, that makes all the difference. My millionaire opponent and his far-right allies are funneling MILLIONS into our district because they know it'll determine who controls Congress. clean_body: Peter, I have a big favor to ask: If just 5% of folks reading this email chipped in $10, we would hit our $3 million goal in no time. Can I count on you to step up with a split donation of $10 between my campaign and Defeat Boebert PAC today to ensure my team and I have the resources we need to push back against the $40 million worth of attack ads Ted Cruz and his allies are running against us right now? RUSH MY DONATION Last time around, Ted Cruz won his race by just over 2% of the vote – that was a difference of about 215,000 votes, Peter. I remember how it felt watching the results roll in on November 6, 2018, and let me tell you, it was a nail-biter. I have no doubts that this year will be when we finally send Ted Cruz packing. But despite being closer than ever to defeating Ted, we've still got a lot more work to do and only a handful of days left to do it. I know seeing a number like $3 million can feel overwhelming, but if thousands of hardworking folks like you chip in $5 here, $25 there, and the occasional $100, we will be able to collectively reach this critical goal. So please, will you chip in a split donation between my campaign and Defeat Boebert PAC of $10 or whatever you can afford now so I can hit my final end-of-month goal and flip Texas blue? We've got zero time left to go, so let's get it done, Peter! If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your split donation between Colin Allred and Defeat Boebert PAC will go through immediately: RUSH IN $25 RUSH IN $50 RUSH IN $100 RUSH IN $250 RUSH IN $500 OTHER AMOUNT Thanks for being on my team, Colin

clean_body: Happy Halloween, Peter! I hope you're having a fun and cozy night. I don't want to interrupt the festivities, so I'll make this quick. With Election Day around the corner, right now is the most critical time to surge support for EMILY'S List women up and down the ballot. Let me explain: Over the past month, I've been on the ground in Michigan, Arizona, Nevada, and a few other key states. I've talked to voters, candidates, and volunteers all across the country. And I can tell you firsthand that the polls and the pundits are right: our women's races will be close. There's a saying in politics, beloved by fundraisers and field organizers alike: the margin of effort. When the polls are tight, and a race could go either way, what matters most is the heart, grit, and commitment of the supporters. If we put in the work, we'll win. If we don't, we won't. Critical races like VP Kamala Harris', Sen. Tammy Baldwin's (WI-SEN), and Rep. Susan Wild's (PA-07) now fall squarely within the margin of effort. And your support can help make sure we reach as many voters as possible before Nov. 5. Let's give it all we've got, Peter. Please donate toward our $300,000 End-of-October fundraising goal now: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/el-q42024-em Thanks for being part of this team, Jessica Mackler (she/her/hers) President, EMILY'S List ---- PAID FOR BY EMILY'S LIST WWW.EMILYSLIST.ORG AND NOT AUTHORIZED BY ANY CANDIDATE OR CANDIDATE'S COMMITTEE. Your support throughout this campaign is something I will never forget. I cannot thank you enough for being part of this important journey. Let’s bring it home. Thank you and stay safe, Tom

clean_body: Friend, I'm about to ask you to chip in every dollar you can to help SherrodBrown win in Ohio and defend our Democratic Senate majority – but first, letme explain why this is so damn important for ALL of us. But hell, if you wantto click here and chip in right away, I'm not gonna stop you.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/sherrod-brown-email-wr-24?amounts=250,100,50,25,5&refcode;=jtk3725-fr-text I'll get right into it:Democrats have a razor-thin Senate majority, and we're facing a NIGHTMARESenate map. There's a strong chance it will all come down to Ohio, which meansSherrod is the ONLY thing standing between us and a Republican Senate. Friend,I've worked on campaigns for a long time. I've been on the winning side andthe losing side. If there's one thing I know, it's that money makes a BIGdifference. TV ads, phone banks, yardsigns, campaign events in every corner of the state – it all adds up FAST.That's why I'm so terrified right now. If this were a simple battle betweengood and evil, I wouldn't be worried – Sherrod is as good a leader as Ohioanshave ever had. He fights harder for workers than anybody I know, and he's notafraid to take on the big banks and corporations that are making things harderfor the middle class. But money muddies the waters, and his opponent has got aton of it. He's poured A TON into his own campaign, and there's a lot morewhere that came from. Sherrod simply doesn't have that kind of money – sothat's where this grassroots team needs to come in and have his back, friend.I know Sherrod can win this critical race and keep the Senate blue, but ONLYIF we all come together to give him the resources he needs. So I'm asking:Will you rush $5, $25, or even $50 to help him win in Ohio and defend ourSenate majority? https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/sherrod-brown-email-wr-24?amounts=250,100,50,25,5&refcode;=jtk3725-fr-text Thanks for doingyour part – there's simply no other option if we want to save the Senate! –James Carville -------- This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. Now that she's catching up to him in the polls, people are starting tonotice that with Debbie as the Democratic nominee, Florida is winnable. As asitting senator from Georgia, I'll always put working families and smallbusinesses first, friend. And like me, Debbie knows that we need to do more tosupport hardworking Americans in the South and across the country. With hercommitment to reducing high costs and inflation, protecting Social Securityand Medicare, and restoring reproductive freedom, we need Debbie's voice inthe Senate representing Floridians. If tonight made anything clear, it’s that Josh Hawley is wrong for Missouri.
Instead of telling voters about any actual accomplishment during his time in the Senate or his vision for the future,
Hawley spewed the same lies about me that he’s spent millions of dollars to air on TV since August.
And that says a lot. He doesn’t want to talk about his career-long crusade to restrict reproductive freedoms like abortion, birth control, and IVF.
He thinks it’s acceptable that he hasn’t brought back even one dollar of congressionally directed spending to Missouri,
and he’s desperate to make Missourians forget about the fact that he’s never actually in Missouri — only returning here an average of six times per year. 
Missourians need a real warrior for working people fighting for them in the U.S. Senate — and unlike Josh Hawley, I’m ready to serve.
But I need your help over these next five days to make sure every voter knows about their choice in this election,

clean_body: Fellow Patriot, We are just DAYS AWAY from the final end-of-month deadline ofthe election. This is the last email I’ll send you on the matter. We’re stillshort of where we need to be, and we can’t miss our goal. This is the mostIMPORTANT Senate race in the country, so I don’t want you to sit on thesidelines. Can you pitch in a few dollars or whatever you can right now? RUSHA CONTRIBUTION The consequences of falling short could be DEVASTATING for ourmovement. This race is going to be close, and your contribution could be theone that pushes us over the edge to victory. But if we don’t have theresources we need to fight back against the establishment, we could lose thisrace and hand over six more years to career politician Tim Kaine. Ourgrassroots team is one of the strongest in the country, and I know that if weall do our part, we CAN flip Virginia RED!! But I need your help, and I needit ASAP. Can you pitch in $5, $25, $100, or whatever you can before MIDNIGHTTONIGHT so we can meet our CRITICAL end-of-month goal? SAVE OUR COUNTRYEverything we’ve worked so hard for comes down to this. I hope I can count onyour support. In Liberty, CAPT Hung Cao USN (Ret) Paid for by Hung Cao forVirginia Use of military rank, job titles, and photographs in uniform does notimply endorsement by the Department of the Navy or the Department of Defense.

clean_body: Donald Trump rallied thousands of his supporters in New Mexico today in a last-ditch effort to flip New Mexico and boost my multimillionaire opponent. Trump spread lies about our state, falsely claimed that he’s won here twice, and called for the thousands of rally-goers to vote for my challenger, Nella Domenici. He even gave her stage time to tear down our campaign: "Let’s make sure we fire Martin Heinrich. And let’s make sure we reject Kamala Harris. And it’s time to bring back Donald Trump!" — Nella Domenici After the media attention Nella and Trump got from today’s rally, it’s never been more urgent to bring in resources to keep up our TV ads and get our message out to voters. We can’t let their falsehoods stick — or risk Trump and my MAGA opponent winning in New Mexico. Will you help us fight back by rushing in $10 or any amount before our final fundraising deadline of the election tonight?[http://secure.actblue.com/donate/mth-em-october-2024] If you’ve saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately: CHIP IN $10 NOW [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mth-em-october-2024?express_lane=true&amount;=10] CHIP IN $25 NOW[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mth-em-october-2024?express_lane=true&amount;=25] CHIP IN $50 NOW[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mth-em-october-2024?express_lane=true&amount;=50] CHIP IN $100 NOW[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mth-em-october-2024?express_lane=true&amount;=100] CHIP IN $250 NOW[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mth-em-october-2024?express_lane=true&amount;=250] OTHER[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mth-em-october-2024] Nella is standing with Donald Trump and his bigotry. Our campaign is standing with working people in New Mexico. Dear Peter,

I’m personally asking you to support the Democratic Party ofGeorgia and the Nevada State Democratic Party with a donation right now and Iwant you to know why it matters.

MitchMcConnell and his allies spent over $55 million to defeat me in 2022 becausethey knew Nevada was the key to controlling the Senate. I narrowly won re-election by less than a percentage point and I couldn’t have done it withoutgrassroots supporters like you.

The stakes could not be higher in Nevada. Thefar-right is pouring even more money into Nevada to flip this critical swing-state red. There’s 5 days left in this election. All signs are pointingtowards victory coming down to the margins. Our reproductive freedoms, ourvoting rights, our democracy, and more could come down to a few thousandNevada voters.

With just 5 days left in this election, we cannot afford to siton the sidelines right now.

clean_body: Fellow Conservative, I’m sorry I had to email you so late, so I’ll keep it short. Our campaign to take back Wisconsin and end Schumer’s Majority is facing its final end-of-month fundraising deadline, and we're $540 short of hitting our FINAL fundraising target at midnight. If just a few more patriots step up before midnight tonight, our campaign will be back on track. Can I count on you to pitch in $3 or $5 before 11:59 pm tonight? For America, Eric Hovde Republican for U.S. Senate DONATE NOW MEET ERIC Eric's a fourth-generation Wisconsinite, born and raised in the Madison area. He's an entrepreneur. He founded and managed his first business in his twenties and then went on to start and build many others. When he is not running his businesses, he is focused on his family and his philanthropic endeavors. He and his brother Steve operate 10 Hovde Homes around the world that provide shelter, supportive services, and love to vulnerable children. Join CONTRIBUTEMONTHLY

clean_body:
Dear Valued Supporter,

As we approach the end of our fundraising period, every dollar counts. We have one last ask to make: Will you chip in $5 or more to help us reach our goal by midnight tonight?

As a member of Congress, I’ve been laser-focused on delivering results that make a real difference in people's lives — fighting to protect Social Security and Medicare, restore and defend our freedoms, invest in Oregon’s infrastructure, and lower costs for working families. But National Republicans are dead-set on defeating me to grow their razor-thin House majority.

They’ve invested a ton of resources into Oregon to replace me with my anti-abortion opponent, who would be nothing more than a rubber stamp for their extreme Project 2025 agenda. While they’re resorting to negative attack ads to mislead voters, my team is connecting with voters on the ground about the stakes and the clear choice they face in this election.

With just five days left, we need your support to continue this work. The best way to ensure we can defend my seat and flip the House blue is by reaching and mobilizing every voter possible across the district. So please, [FIRST_NAME]: Will you help us do this important work by pitching in $10 or more to my campaign today? If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately.

name: C. Allred
subject: the best position to win.
body: Defeating Ted Cruz is going to come down to some simple math, friend: – Let meremind you: In 2018, Ted Cruz won by just 214,921 votes. – In the six yearssince, 2.6 million Texans have registered to vote. Now, Cruz and I aredeadlocked in the polls, so here it is: If we can reach more newly registeredvoters than he can in these last few days, we'll be in the best position towin. That's where you come in, friend: Will you split $5 or more between mycampaign and Jacky Rosen’s to help reach my $1,000,000 end-of-month goal sothat we can take advantage of our best chance EVER at firing Ted Cruz?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/rosenfornevada_allred?refcode=jtk5257-bu-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 Whether he's abandoning us and flying to Cancúnduring a deadly winter freeze or celebrating Roe v. Wade being overturned, TedCruz has shown time and time again he will never put Texans first. It's timeto finally hold him accountable and we're SO CLOSE to doing that – but Cruzand his allies are spending over $40 million in a last-ditch effort to stop us– all while Texans are beginning to cast their ballots! I need your help tofight back. If you're ready to kick Ted Cruz out of the Senate, please give $5or whatever you can, split between my campaign and Jacky Rosen’s, beforemidnight tonight. We can flip Texas blue and help Democrats hold the Senate –but only if we all work together.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/rosenfornevada_allred?refcode=jtk5257-bu-text&amounts;=250,100,50,25,5 Thank you so much. clean_body: We are two honorary Spokespups 👻🐶 for Schiff. Part of the doggy community working to send Adam to the Senate. And today, we’re dressed as two very scary people — Donald Trump’s handpicked Postmaster General Louis DeJoy 📫 and a potential Senator Steve Garvey ⚾️. As Democracy Dogs, we’re Adam’s loyal team of canine campaign supporters. While Adam goes for walks and talks to voters about his plans to make a difference for hard-working families, Postmaster Louis DeJoy’s meddling is threatening to disrupt the USPS’ mail ballot deliveries from within as a result of his disastrous policies. We know it’s a doggy stereotype to bark at mail carriers, but we might have to bark at him. And Adam’s opponent, Steve Garvey, might have been good at playing baseball (hey, we’d play fetch with him), but he doesn’t have what it takes to deliver for Californians. That’s why we’re asking you to chip in a few barks to Adam’s campaign! Let’s make sure we send Adam, a certified dog-lover, to the Senate. clean_body: Nella I am ready to get to work on DAY ONE with Pres. Trump to secure our borders and fix what the left has broken. Peter, I was just boots on the ground at the border in New Mexico, once again assessing the situation and reminding voters justhow bad Kamala Harris and Martin Heinrich have allowed it to become. Of course, 'bad' is the understatement of the century. Words and phrases like 'horrifying,' 'deadly,' and 'worst in history' get closer to appropriate descriptions of what has happened under their watch. And it's not like they just allowed it to happen – they curated this disaster! THERE'S NO WAY we can allow Harris or Heinrich to continue failing us in Washington, D.C., and I need your help to defeat them and their radical agenda here in New Mexico. I am ready to get to work on DAY ONE with Pres. Trump to secure our borders and fix what the left has broken. We're so close to the finish line, and I need your help to get across. Please rush $10 or more to help us keep fighting every minute all the way until the end, when we've flipped this seat, secured the Senate, and ensured we have the ability to get our country back on track. Thank you, Nella Domenici Help Elect Nella and Secure the Border » ABOUT NELLA New Mexico is Nella Domenici's home. She was born in Albuquerque and lived for most of her childhood in a home near the intersection of Lomas and Monroe with her seven siblings, and her parents - Pete and Nancy Domenici. Nella began her education at Our Lady of Fatima, where she learned the values she holds today. Nella is a proud third-generation New Mexican, devoted mother of two, step-mom of four, and the wife of a Navy Veteran. Nella's family's roots run deep in New Mexico and she and her husband Pat enjoy their family home in New Mexico that they have owned for nearly twenty years. Like most New Mexicans, Nella Domenici understands the importance of hard work. She waited tables to help pay for her undergraduate degree from Georgetown University, and worked her way through night school at Georgetown Law while holding down a full time job. She then graduated from Harvard Business School as a Baker Scholar, top 5%, while 9 months pregnant. Nella began her career at the bottom and worked her way up through the complex finance world, eventually serving as CFO for one of the world's largest, most successful investment firms. In her career, Nella advised, invested in, grew, and led many companies, and served on public company boards. The industries she has worked in are vast and include areas such as health care, AI, food service, lodging, commercial real estate, mortgage lending, and consumer products. These companies have ranged from small family-owned businesses, to rapidly growing venture backed enterprises, to a Fortune 200 company. Several of these have been headquartered in New Mexico. Collectively, the companies Nella has been heavily involved with have employed thousands of Americans. Like her father and mother, Nella has been a warrior for those who most need an advocate: for women competing in academics or business, for families dealing with mental illness, and for those without access to quality healthcare or education. JOIN NELLA Follow Nella Online Checks can be made payable to Nella for Senate and mailed to PO Box 92918 | Albuquerque, NM 87199 Paid for by Nella for Senate Don't want to receive any more of our emails? We hate to see you go: unsubscribe .

body: The GOP raised $331 million in our second quarter, signaling that their right-wing backers will stop at nothing to advance the MAGA movement, ban abortion nationwide, and tear down our democracy. | | |  --- | ![](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/097/354/original/2023_09_Email-Wrapper-Graphic_B_v2.png) |  ---|--- **If we want to compete with MAGA extremists up and down the ballot, we need to come together as a team. VP Harris said it best:** ![Everything is at stake](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/109/872/original/2024_06_30_Harris_Callout_OFT's-Version.png) If you agree with VP Harris’ message, will you chip in a 5X-matched gift of $7 to help state Democrats go toe-to-toe with their Republican opponents? | If you've stored your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will process immediately.  --- | 5X-MATCH $7 --- | 5X-MATCH $25 --- | 5X-MATCH $50 --- | 5X-MATCH $100 --- | 5X-MATCH $250 --- | OTHER » ---  State legislative elections are frequently overlooked and underfunded – butmany key issues, like access to reproductive care, will be decided solely inthe states.And to make matters more frightening – the GOP raised $331 million in oursecond quarter this year, signaling that their right-wing backers will stop atnothing to advance the MAGA movement, ban abortion nationwide, and tear downour democracy.**That’s why we must elect Democrats who will build a better future in placeslike your community.**Vice President Harris named the stakes. Ahead of our final end-of-monthdeadline before Election Day, we’re calling on you to help fuel our fight:Rush a 5X-matched $7 gift to help state Democrats compete against the GOP’smillions →Thanks,Team DLCC   **5X-MATCH: ACTIVE »** **MAKE IT MONTHLY »**             | --- Paid for by the Democratic Legislative Campaign Committee, dlcc.org. Notauthorized by any candidate or candidate's committee.  Contributions or gifts to DLCC are not tax deductible. | The Democratic Legislative Campaign Committee is dedicated to winning and defending Democratic majorities in state legislatures across the country. This message was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com because you are a part of our grassroots network.  Emails are a crucial way to stay in touch with our supporters. Please add usto your address book or safe senders list to ensure timely election updates.  We're fighting to elect Democrats and advance a progressive vision in thestates. Our success depends on grassroots donors like you. Ninety-eightpercent of our donors give less than $200, and two-thirds give less than $20.To make a contribution, please click here. To unsubscribe and stop receivingemails about our efforts, please click here. ---  | | Sent via ActionNetwork.org. To update your email address, change your name or address, or to stop receiving emails from Democratic Legislative Campaign Committee, please click here.  ---  ![](https://an.dlcc.org/ss/o/u001.ZbNyqOfLYPaP-d23SgKjnQ/4b3/JQiAViUWRUiu1Ts6ouL7ng/ho.gif)

We say this a lot, but tonight it feelsparticularly true: The stakes couldn't be higher. Senate control. Down in thepolls. Being outspent 3-to-1. clean_body: TAMMY BALDWIN FOR SENATE We're so close to reaching our 150,000 donation goal, Peter. The response from this email alone could be enough to put us over the top. We can’t sit on the sidelines while my opponent, Mitch McConnell, and their right-wing allies flood our airwaves with $100 million worth of deceptive attack ads — not when Eric Hovde has taken the lead in recent polling. But there are only 5 days left to stop the GOP’s momentum, defend Wisconsin’s Senate seat, and protect our Democratic Senate majority. So before our deadline at midnight, I'm coming directly to you, Peter: Will you pitch in anything you can to help us reach our very last end-of-month fundraising goal? Here’s a secure link you can use to make a donation: [https://act.tammybaldwin.com/go/2155?c0=tbe-em-oct24.yPYsfQ&refcode;=AU_STB_FR_GEN_EOM_AC_20241031_PM6_V1_S1&t;=1004&akid;=4393%2E35263%2EHre1yJ]secure.actblue.com/donate/tbe-em-oct24 Thanks for all your support, Tammy P.
