clean_body: Tim Sheehy and his backers have virtually unlimited resources to attack me. My opponents are spending nearly $90 million in ads. Sheehy has even poured $2.4 million of his own fortune into his campaign trying to buy Montana’s Senate seat. To make matters worse, we’ve fallen way behind on our fundraising targets—which means we’ve got a lot of work to do if we want to catch back up. If we want to beat them, we have to hit our goal tonight. No ifs, ands, or buts. There is no better way to make an impact on the outcome of this race than chipping in a grassroots donation today. I hate asking, but I need to: Will you make a split contribution between my campaign and UNITEDemocrats to help us catch up on our goal before time runs out? If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your split donation between Jon Tester and UNITEDemocrats will go through immediately: CONTRIBUTE $7 »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ud_q42024_spl-tester?amount=7&amounts=10,15,20&express_lane=true] CONTRIBUTE $15 »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ud_q42024_spl-tester?amount=15&amounts=10,15,20&express_lane=true] Or a custom donation »[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ud_q42024_spl-tester?amount=20&amounts=10,15,20] Thanks for everything, Jon Tester

clean_body: Team — Is there anything we could say to convince you to pitch in ahead of our last end-of-month fundraising deadline before this election? What if we told you that we’re less than one week away from Election Day when the final votes will be cast for this extremely important election? What if we told you that millions of Arizonans are casting their votes right now? That means the clock is ticking, and our time to convince undecided voters to back our movement is quickly running out. And what if we told you that more Republicans have cast their ballots than Democrats so far in Arizona? Or that Donald Trump and Vice President Harris are neck and neck in the polls right now — making every person, every conversation, and every vote absolutely essential to securing a win for VP Harris and sending Trump packing for good? All of this is true, and it’s why we need to hit our fundraising goal tonight. Falling short puts all of the work we’ve done at risk. So please, will you pitch in anything you can spare ahead of our final monthly fundraising deadline? We are counting down the days to make an impact in this election. If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately: CHIP IN $3 NOW [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/azd-em-oct24?express_lane=true&amount;=3] CHIP IN $10 NOW[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/azd-em-oct24?express_lane=true&amount;=10]CHIP IN $25 NOW [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/azd-em-oct24?express_lane=true&amount;=25] CHIP IN $50 NOW[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/azd-em-oct24?express_lane=true&amount;=50]CHIP IN $100 NOW [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/azd-em-oct24?express_lane=true&amount;=100] ANOTHER AMOUNT[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/azd-em-oct24] Thanks for your support, Arizona Democratic Party Arizona Democratic Party PO Box 36123 Phoenix, AZ 85067-6123 United States info@azdem.org [info@azdem.org] Paid for by Arizona Democrats This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com . clean_body:
Hello,

sometimes you just need to make your coffee a double. And thanks to a generous group of donors, your contribution will be doubled too. Donors are matching gifts until our final end-of-month deadline tonight. This rare opportunity won’t last, so please don’t miss your chance to increase your impact. Click here to make a split donation of any amount—and have it matched—to help us win 2024’s most important race.
https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/gfs_tester?refcode=jtk5605-bu-text&amounts=%3D5,%2C25,%5Cn50,100,250
We’re not the only ones doubling down their efforts to win this race. Mitch McConnell’s allies are spending nearly $90 million to help my out-of-stater opponent win.
They’re flooding the airwaves and trying to drown out our message. Experts rank Montana’s Senate race a toss-up—which means this race could go either way. And with recent polls locked in a tie, it’s anyone’s to win.
Look, the sky won’t fall if you don’t chip in, and I’ll never trick you into donating. That’s not how I do things. But I will tell you the truth: We need to raise another $2,000,000 by midnight tonight and we’re falling behind. We need to work twice as hard to catch up and compete. Will you make a matched donation today and have it split? I’m counting on you to step up.
https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/gfs_tester?refcode=jtk5605-bu-text&amounts=%3D5,%2C25,%5Cn50,100,250
I appreciate your support. When we win this thing, it’ll be because of people like you.
–Jon
name: Jon Tester
subject: Anyone’s to win

We have just hours untilmidnight to reach our final end-of-month fundraising goal of this election.

Will you take a moment to read Kim's message, and then, chip in any amounttowards our $120,000 goal? DONATE: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/schrier-oct24 

----------Begin Forwarded Message--------- Sender: Kim (personal)
Subject: We need to ensure our voter outreach efforts can run all the waythrough Election Day.
 Date: Thurs, Oct 31, 2024 Peter, As we head intoNovember, I want to first thank you for all the help and support you've shownthis election season. The commitment from our grassroots team has beenincredible, and I know we have what it takes to win in just five days. But ourjob isn't done yet. We need to ensure our voter outreach efforts can continuastrong all the way until the polls close on Tuesday. Every conversationmatters, and we need to reach as many voters as possible in these final days.
Will you chip in today to help us meet our final end-of-month fundraising goalof the election cycle and keep WA-08 blue? You can donate here:https://secure.actblue.com/donate/schrier-oct24&refcode2;=Peter

Thank you much, Kim

Peter, I wanted to make sure you saw my earlier message. Our final end-of-month deadline is in a few hours. These resources are critical to our effortsto counter Trump's attacks and reach undecided voters as they head to thepolls. **This is so important. Will you add a $47 gift before midnight so wehave the means to win this election in five short days?** We have built aremarkable movement. Let's keep fighting until the last polling place closeson Tuesday. Thank you and take care, Kamala 

---------- Forwarded message--------- 
From: Kamala Harris Date: Thursday, October 31, 2024 Subject: Will you make your very first $47 contribution right away? Tonight isour final end-of-month deadline, and every dollar we raise will be putstraight to use turning out the voters we need to win. Peter, tonight marks the final end-of-month deadline of this election. The polls are tightening, the attack ads are intensifying, and Donald Trump and his allies are outspending us in key battleground states. **To get back on track, we set a goal to receive 236 more donations from Cresco in the next couple of hours.** So, I am turning to you, Peter. You and are among my most dedicated supporters, and you understand the stakes of this election. **Will you make your first contribution right away? Tonight is our final end-of-month deadline, and every dollar we raise will be put straight to use turning out the voters we need to win.** _If you've saved payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately:_ 

 | $47 >> -

clean_body: Peter — I'm aiming to make this one of the shortest emails in your inboxbecause I know you're getting a lot of requests and your time is valuable. Solet me get straight to the point: I'm up against my final end-of-monthfundraising deadline before Election Day. It comes as polls show me tied withRick Scott, as Floridians begin voting, and as I'm up against $38 million inads to defeat me — courtesy of Scott's fraudulently-earned personal fortune.We've launched an audacious but necessary goal: Raise $10 million before theclock strikes midnight on Oct. 31 so we can fight Rick Scott's attacks, reachevery single voter, and win this seat to protect Democratic Senate control.Every dollar of this $10 million goal will be made up of contributions frompeople like you, which is why I'm counting on you in this moment: Will youplease donate $5, or whatever you can, to help me defeat Rick Scott? RUSH ADONATION — Debbie Paid for by Defeat Boebert PAC This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com . Don't want to receive these emails anymore?UnsubscribeDefeat Boebert PAC,

body: Peter — I'm aiming to make this one of the shortest emails in your inboxbecause I know you're getting a lot of requests and your time is valuable. Solet me get straight to the point: I'm up against my final end-of-monthfundraising deadline before Election Day. It comes as polls show me tied withRick Scott, as Floridians begin voting, and as I'm up against $38 million inads to defeat me — courtesy of Scott's fraudulently-earned personal fortune.We've launched an audacious but necessary goal: Raise $10 million before theclock strikes midnight on Oct. 31 so we can fight Rick Scott's attacks, reachevery single voter, and win this seat to protect Democratic Senate control.Every dollar of this $10 million goal will be made up of contributions frompeople like you, which is why I'm counting on you in this moment: Will youplease donate $5, or whatever you can, to help me defeat Rick Scott? RUSH ADONATION — Debbie Paid for by Defeat Boebert PAC This email was sent todpwillis67@gmail.com . Don't want to receive these emails anymore?UnsubscribeDefeat Boebert PAC,

Friends, I just stepped off the stage in Nevada.
We have the momentum, and we still have work to do to earn every vote in this critical battleground state so that we can elect Democrats down the ballot.
Donald Trump, JD Vance, and their allies are going to throw everything at us for the next few days – **_Will you directly power our efforts to win Nevada and the White House?_**
Split a $20 donation between the Nevada Democratic Party and my campaign today:
If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately: --- 
| $20 | $35 | $50 ---
|---|--- $75 | $100 | Other
The work ahead will be hard. But hard work is good work. And it is joyful work when we do it together.
Thanks and take care,
Kamala

clean_body: Harrison Butker said it best. We need a Presidentwho will stand **STRONG** and **FIGHT** for the unborn, _someone who willstand up for the most vulnerable in our society. The other side has made itclear—** _they want to push their agenda of abortion on demand, and they willdo whatever it takes to silence the pro-life movement._ But we won’t letthem. President Trump has been the strongest defender of the unborn we’veever seenin the White House. **He’s not afraid to stand up for life, and that’sexactly what our country needs right now.** We should be fighting for themost vulnerable, fighting for the unborn. If you are going to donate to anyorganization this cycle, it should be ours, we are mobilizing Christians tovote for **LIFE** in 2024. **That’s the future we’re fighting for.** We areworking to mobilize voters of faith, but we need your help to keep up thefight. Do you agree with Harrison Butker? Will you stand with us andsupport the most pro-life President we’ve ever had?

name: Navy SEAL Ryan Zinke
subject: maybe I bit off more than I could chew
body: But I like to think Conservatives will come through in the end. ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏  Maybe I bit off more than I could chew. Maybethat’s just the way it is. Maybe the Democrat Machine is just too strong withtheir army of highfalutin mega-donors. But I like to think Conservatives willcome through in the end. My name is Ryan Zinke. Look, I served as PresidentTrump’s Secretary of the Interior and as commander at SEAL Team 6 – it takes alot to shake me. But the Democrat Machine has unloaded 322,000,000 dollars tobury House Conservatives and another 70,000,000 bucks to make Montana aDemocrat state. If we stay the course in terms of fundraising, not only willfolks in tight races (like me) lose, but Republicans may never controlCongress again. That’s why I’m going to be completely straightforward withyou, Friend: I’m personally asking you for one last contribution to savevulnerable Republicans before the Democrat Machine wipes us all out. This isso important that I’m partnering with Majority Leader Steve Scalise to helpraise one million dollars before Election Day. The election is next week. clean_body: As we enter the final days before Election Day, I want to take a moment to reflect on the incredible journey we've shared. From the earliest days of this election cycle, you've been the driving force behind our efforts to grow the House Majority. As Chairman of the National Republican Congressional Committee, I've had the privilege of traveling the country, working with our candidates, and seeing your impact firsthand. Your generosity has allowed us to build a top-notch team, craft cutting-edge campaigns, and fight the Democrat machine. But I know that our success isn't just about House Republicans - it's about the countless hours you've volunteered, your thoughtful survey responses, and the contributions you've given to fuel our movement. You're the unsung hero of our party, and I'm honored to stand alongside you in this fight. Now, as we sprint to the finish line, I need your help one more time if you can spare a few dollars. We're facing a fierce battle in the final days of this election, and every dollar counts. That's why I'm humbly asking you to make a final contribution to help defend our razor-thin House Majority. Your donation will go directly towards our Get Out the Vote efforts, advertising, and other key pieces of our campaign operation. It will help us defend our vulnerable incumbents, flip key seats, and elect a new generation of conservative leaders. If you can swing it, one last contribution would mean the world to me, but if not, please don't stress, you've done so much for us already. Thank you and God Bless America, Richard Hudson **Chairman**, National Republican Congressional Committee --- | ![](https://www.myimgcloud.com/0d8b0490-e4fc-4393-8de6-5e67d4a702d9.png) --- | --- | Paid for by the NRCC and not authorized by any candidate or candidate's committee. clean_body:
Friend,
I almost spilled my coffee when I got the news — did you see this poll? A recent, A+ poll shows that we’re statistically tied with Rick Scott.
He’s spent millions on TV ads attacking me, and he still can’t pull ahead. I’ve said it all along: Florida is in play. We can win this race. I know it, Florida Floridians know it, and Rick Scott knows it too. That’s why he and his super PAC are spending millions of dollars every week attacking me and trying to buy his Senate seat again. He spent $10.5 million on new ads, and he just infused his campaign with another $3 MILLION from his own corrupt fortune. This race is so close — and with this grassroots movement, we can retire creepy Rick for good.
But I need you with me. My LAST fundraising deadline of the Election is just days away, friend. Will you chip in $5 right now to help me close the gap on my FINAL $4 MILLION goal? https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2461-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250
Every single dollar helps us put up more ads, knock more doors, call more voters, and make sure every Floridian knows that they have a choice this November — and that we can finally replace corrupt Rick Scott with a senator who will put Floridians first. I am so proud of the movement we have built, and with your help, we are going to win on Election Day.
https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2461-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250
Thank you,
Debbie P.

P.S. Check out the latest poll here.
https://maristpoll.marist.edu/polls/u-s-presidential-contest-florida-october-2024/
--------

clean_body: On October 22, a federal judge decreed that I had 7days to hand over my home in New York – as well as my only car and sentimentalkeepsakes and heartfelt gifts that I collected over the span of 80 years. Ithought that would be the end of the damage… But with the election rightaround the corner, Kamala’s Deep State truly wants to ruin me with all they’vegot. They’re now considering dealing one final blow to me. A judge may noworder me to give up my remaining home in Florida – my primary residence. As mylawyer inquired: do they truly want me homeless? Over the last few days, we’veheard ridiculous claims about President Trump being a “fascist.” Let me tellyou what fascism is… Fascism is weaponizing the legal system to punish yourpolitical opponents. Fascism is having your home taken from you. Fascism istaking the law license away from your opponent’s lawyer. Fascism is trying toturn your enemies into political prisoners. I am living through theDemocrats’ fascism right now. I sincerely pray that freedom, justice, and thetruth prevail on Tuesday, November 5 – or the damage done to me will spreadlike wildfire to the rest of our great Republic. But, as I wrote to you in anearlier letter, the Bible reminds us that our earthly possessions will alwaysfade, but greater “heavenly treasures” await us. The pursuit of truth,freedom, and justice are worth infinitely more than a car or a home.Possessions come and go, but I couldNEVER SURRENDER my fight for freedom andfor what I know to betrue. I would be tone deaf if I didn’t acknowledge thattimes are tough right now for all Americans, not just me, so please stopreading here if you cannot give at this time. But funding my Legal DefenseTrust is my last remaining hope of fighting for my freedom and for the libertyand justice of all Americans. So, if you can, and, seriously, only if you can,please make a contribution to my Legal Defense Trust – the Rudy GiulianiFreedom Fund – as I keep fighting for my freedom and justice as Kamala’s DeepState tries to JAIL me for life. CONTRIBUTE $25 CONTINUE READING »

clean_body: On October 22, a federal judge decreed that I had 7 days to hand over my home in New York – as well as my only car and sentimental keepsakes and heartfelt gifts that I collected over the span of 80 years. _I thought that would be the end of the damage…_ But with the election right around the corner, Kamala’s Deep State _truly_ wants to ruin me with all they’ve got. They’re now considering dealing one final blow to me. **A judge may now order me to give up my _remaining_ home in Florida – __my primary residence.__** As my lawyer inquired: _do they truly want me homeless?__ I sincerely pray that freedom, justice, and the truth prevail on Tuesday, November 5 – or the damage done to me will spread like wildfire to the rest of our great Republic. _The pursuit of truth, freedom, and justice are worth infinitely more than a car or a home. Possessions come and go, but I could NEVER SURRENDER my fight for freedom and for what I know to be _true.__ I would be tone deaf if I didn’t acknowledge that times are tough right now for _all_ Americans, not just me, so please stop reading here if you cannot give at this time. _But funding my Legal Defense Trust is my last remaining hope of fighting for my freedom and for the liberty and justice of all Americans._ So, if you can, and, seriously, only if you can, please make a contribution to my Legal Defense Trust – the Rudy Giuliani Freedom Fund – as I keep fighting for my freedom and justice as Kamala’s Deep State tries to JAIL me for life. CONTRIBUTE $25 - CONTribute $50 - CONTRIBUTE $100 - CONTRIBUTE $250 - CONTRIBUTE $500 - CONTRIBUTE OTHER AMOUNT Thank you and God bless you, _Rudy Giuliani Rudy Giuliani Freedom Fund Paid for by Rudy Giuliani Freedom Fund Legal Defense Trust_ American Defense News _

Possessions come and go, but I could _NEVER SURRENDER_ my fightfor freedom and for what I know to be _true.__ --- I would be tone deaf if I didn’t acknowledge that times are tough right nowfor _all_ Americans, not just me, so please stop reading here if you cannotgive at this time. --- _But funding my Legal Defense Trust is my last remaining hope of fighting formy freedom and for the liberty and justice of all Americans._ --- **So, if you can, and, seriously, only if you can, please make a contributionto my Legal Defense Trust – the Rudy Giuliani Freedom Fund – as I keepfighting for my freedom and justice as Kamala’s Deep State tries to JAIL mefor life.** ---  CONTRIBUTE $25 ---  CONTRIBUTE $50 ---  CONTRIBUTE $100 ---  CONTRIBUTE $250 ---  CONTRIBUTE $500 ---  CONTRIBUTE OTHER AMOUNT ---  Thank you and God bless you, --- ![](https://d15k2d11r6t6rl.cloudfront.net/public/users/Integrators/669d5713-9b6a-46bb-bd7e-c542cff6dd6a/9597edec9d3b4dbc906aaef6d7010e2a/Giuliani_Signature.png) --- Rudy Giuliani Rudy Giuliani Freedom Fund ---   --- Paid for by Rudy Giuliani Freedom Fund Legal Defense Trust ---    American Defense News --- _PO Box 1188 Fort Collins, CO 80522_ _**unsubscribe**_ | _manage data preferences_

clean_body: As we enter the final days before Election Day, I want to take a moment to reflect on the incredible journey we've shared. From the earliest days of this election cycle, you've been the driving force behind our efforts to grow the House Majority. As Chairman of the National Republican Congressional Committee, I've had the privilege of traveling the country, working with our candidates, and seeing your impact firsthand. Your generosity has allowed us to build a top-notch team, craft cutting-edge campaigns, and fight the Democrat machine. But I know that our success isn't just about House Republicans - it's about the countless hours you've volunteered, your thoughtful survey responses, and the contributions you've given to fuel our movement. You're the unsung hero of our party, and I'm honored to stand alongside you in this fight. Now, as we sprint to the finish line, I need your help one more time if you can spare a few dollars. We're facing a fierce battle in the final days of this election, and every dollar counts. That's why I'm humbly asking you to make a final contribution to help defend our razor-thin House Majority. Your donation will go directly towards our Get Out the Vote efforts, advertising, and other key pieces of our campaign operation. It will help us defend our vulnerable incumbents, _flip key seats, and elect a new generation of conservative leaders._ If you can swing it, one last contribution would mean the world to me, but if not, please don't stress, you've done so much for us already. Thank you and God Bless America, **Richard Hudson ** _Chairman_, National Republican Congressional Committee - Paid for by the NRCC and not authorized by any candidate or candidate's committee. clean_body: Friend, You probably didn’t wake up this morning and think, “Today's theday I’m going to make a $10 donation to DMP's campaign!” — but ahead of myLAST deadline of the Election, it's what I’m about to ask you to do. UnlikeRick Scott, I don’t have a massive fortune at my campaign’s disposal. I comefrom a working-class family, so I know my eye-watering $4 million goal isnothing to shake a stick at. But it's the only way I’ll be able to defeat him.If that’s all you need to hear, please click here to chip in $10 now — but I’dlike to share what your hard-earned $10 means to me. See, my family moved to theUnited States from Ecuador when I was 14. But it didn’t come easy, and despite my momworking back-to-back double shifts, we still struggled to afford rent on ourone room apartment. So once I turned 15, I began taking early morning shiftsat a doughnut shop before school. It wasn’t much, but the extra cash gave myfamily room to breathe, and eventually, the life we dreamt of finally cametrue. But I’m not the only one who got their start in the doughnut business.When he was a young man, my opponent, Rick Scott, bought two doughnut shops.While I made minimum wage to help keep the lights on at home, he reaped thebenefits of his employees' hard work. For me, those $10 boxes of doughnutswere a lifeline that helped my family get by. For him, they kicked off acareer in penthouse C-suites. And with your $10, you can help me kick Rick outof the Senate on election night — so please, pitch in now. I went on to graduate college, fight to improve life for working familieslike my own, and become the first South American immigrant elected toCongress. Rick Scott went on to enrich himself off U.S. taxpayers via thelargest Medicare fraud scheme in history, amass a nine-figure fortune, and buyhis way into the Senate. So I don’t take your help toward reaching my $4million goal lightly. There’s simply no way I could ever do it on my own. Myopponent, however, can spend $4 million to get his ads on screens withoutthinking twice — and he has already spent plenty more to stop me. So the onlyway we’ll get him out and give working Floridians the Senate representationwedeserve is if we hit my $4 million goal. Please, friend: Will you give just$10 — about the cost of a dozen doughnuts — to help me retire Rick Scott? This campaign is powered by small-dollar donations, so every cent makes abig difference. Thank you for everything, Debbie
name: @Debbie
subject: What $10 — and a box of doughnuts — means to me
body: Debbie Mucarsel-Powellhttps://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?amounts=5,25,50,100,250&refcode;=jtk2462-fr-text Friend, You probably didn’t wake up this morning and think, “Today's theday I’m going to make a $10 donation to DMP's campaign!” — but ahead of myLAST deadline of the Election, it's what I’m about to ask you to do. UnlikeRick Scott, I don't have a massive fortune at my campaign's disposal. I comefrom a working-class family, so I know my eye-watering $4 million goal isnothing to shake a stick at. But it's the only way I'll be able to defeat him.If that's all you need to hear, please click here to chip in $10 now — but I'dlike to share what your hard-earned $10 means to me.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?amounts=5,25,50,100,250&refcode;=jtk2462-fr-text See, my family moved to the United States from Ecuador with big dreamsfor a better life when I was 14. But it didn't come easy, and despite my momworking back-to-back double shifts, we still struggled to afford rent on ourone room apartment. So once I turned 15, I began taking early morning shiftsat a doughnut shop before school. It wasn't much, but the extra cash gave myfamily room to breathe, and eventually, the life we dreamt of finally cametrue. But I'm not the only one who got their start in the doughnut business.When he was a young man, my opponent, Rick Scott, bought two doughnut shops.While I made minimum wage to help keep the lights on at home, he reaped thebenefits of his employees' hard work. For me, those $10 boxes of doughnutswere a lifeline that helped my family get by. For him, they kicked off acareer in penthouse C-suites. And with your $10, you can help me kick Rick outof the Senate on election night — so please, pitch in now.https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?amounts=5,25,50,100,250&refcode;=jtk2462-fr-text I went on to graduate college, fight to improve life for working familieslike my own, and become the first South American immigrant elected toCongress. Rick Scott went on to enrich himself off U.S. taxpayers via thelargest Medicare fraud scheme in history, amass a nine-figure fortune, and buyhis way into the Senate. So I don't take your help toward reaching my $4million goal lightly. There's simply no way I could ever do it on my own. Myopponent, however, can spend $4 million to get his ads on screens withoutthinking twice — and he has already spent plenty more to stop me. So the onlyway we'll get him out and give working Floridians the Senate representation wedeserve is if we hit my $4 million goal. Please, friend: Will you give just$10 — about the cost of a dozen doughnuts — to help me retire Rick Scott?https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?amounts=5,25,50,100,250&refcode;=jtk2462-fr-text This campaign is powered by small-dollar donations, so every cent makes abig difference. clean_body: As we enter the final days before Election Day, I want to take a moment to reflect on the incredible journey we've shared. From the earliest days of this election cycle, you've been the driving force behind our efforts to grow the House Majority. As Chairman of the National Republican Congressional Committee, I've had the privilege of traveling the country, working with our candidates, and seeing your impact firsthand. Your generosity has allowed us to build a top-notch team, craft cutting-edge campaigns, and fight the Democrat machine. But I know that our success isn't just about House Republicans - **it's about the countless hours you've volunteered, your thoughtful survey responses, and the contributions you've given to fuel our movement. You're the unsung hero of our party, and I'm honored to stand alongside you in this fight.** Now, as we sprint to the finish line, I need your help one more time if you can spare a few dollars. **We're facing a fierce battle in the final days of this election, and every dollar counts. That's why I'm humbly asking you to make a final contribution to help defend our razor-thin House Majority.** Your donation will go directly towards our Get Out the Vote efforts, advertising, and other key pieces of our campaign operation. It will help us defend our vulnerable incumbents, _flip key seats_, and elect a new generation of conservative leaders._ If you can swing it, one last contribution would mean the world to me, but if not, please don't stress, you've done so much for us already. Thank you and God Bless America, **Richard Hudson** **_Chairman_, National Republican Congressional Committee

subject: We can chase 200,000 more ballots
body: The ENTHUSIASM and ENERGY that the Turning Point Action team has seen fromhard-working, patriotic volunteers is incredible. ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏ ͏  Friend, I've got HUNDREDS of patriotic volunteers connectingwith Turning Point Action's CHASE THE VOTE efforts every single day. And forEACH new volunteer our Turning Point Action team can train and deploy, weexpect 200 MORE BALLOTS to be chased! Friend, will you make your most generousgift of $20.24, $50, $100, or even $250 to help Turning Point Action recruit,train, and deploy our NEXT 1,000+ VOLUNTEERS to CHASE 200,000+ MORE BALLOTS?Help patriotic volunteers CHASE THE VOTE and WIN >> Above: Turning PointAction is training MORE VOLUNTEERS to CHASE BALLOTS and supercharge our CHASETHE VOTE efforts every single day. Friend, Turning Point Action's CHASE THEVOTE program is already CHASING 500,000+ BALLOTS nationwide. Now -- with ournext 1,000+ VOLUNTEERS -- we have the opportunity to CHASE an ADDITIONAL200,000+ MORE BALLOTS! The ENTHUSIASM and ENERGY that the Turning Point Actionteam has seen from hard-working, patriotic volunteers is incredible. In fact,our Turning Point Action team is training so many volunteers that we had tomake extra room in a warehouse! See for yourself in the photo above, on theright. Will you help Turning Point Action recruit, train, and deploy our NEXT1,000+ VOLUNTEERS TO CHASE 100,000+ MORE BALLOTS? Please rush your support of$20.24, $50, $100, or even $250 right away. Help patriotic volunteers CHASETHE VOTE and WIN >> Friend, this special program will SUPERCHARGE everythingthat Turning Point Action is doing to CHASE THE VOTE and WIN BIG! And, in theMUST-WIN battleground states of ARIZONA and WISCONSIN especially, everyadditional BALLOT CHASED could truly be the difference between WINNING orLOSING the White House. Please don't wait to make your most generous gift of$20.24, $50, $100, $250, or even more to help Turning Point Action SUPERCHARGEour CHASE THE VOTE efforts, with the help of PATRIOTIC VOLUNTEERS. Thank youfor helping Turning Point Action do all we can to CHASE THE VOTE and WIN BIGthis year. Together, we are doing the work to SAVE AMERICA -- and I am sograteful for YOUR support. Onward! Charlie Kirk Founder Turning Point ActionSupport Turning Point Action PAID FOR BY TURNING POINT ACTION (TPACTION.COM)AND NOT AUTHORIZED BY ANY CANDIDATE OR CANDIDATE'S COMMITTEE 4930 East BeverlyRoad Phoenix, Arizona 85044 Conservatives Give PO Box 461 Fort Collins, CO80522 unsubscribe |manage data preferences

clean_body: But I like to think Conservatives will come through in the end. My name is Ryan Zinke. Look, I served as President Trump's Secretary of the Interior and as commander at SEAL Team 6 - it takes a lot to shake me. But the Democrat Machine has unloaded $322,000,000 dollars to bury House Conservatives and another $70,000,000 bucks to make Montana a Democrat state. If we stay the course in terms of fundraising, not only will folks in tight races (like me) lose, but Republicans may never control Congress again. That's why I'm going to be completely straightforward with you, Friend: I'm personally asking you for one last contribution to save vulnerable Republicans before the Democrat Machine wipes us all out. This is so important that I'm partnering with Majority Leader Steve Scalise to help raise $1,000,000 dollars before Election Day. Think you could lend a hand? A few million bucks won't scare me off. I know that, Majority Leader Scalise knows that, and the Democrats are about to find out the hard way when Conservatives everywhere come forward in droves. Our funds are running DANGEROUSLY LOW so I 'm really hoping that includes you. I've served this nation in Trump's Cabinet and in uniform, now I'm humbly asking you to join our fight to save the country. The election is next week. Please donate now while there's still time to bring the Democrat Machine to its knees. It's House Majority Leader Steve Scalise. I'm respectfully asking you to fill out my ELECTION YEAR CHECK-IN at your earliest convenience. It's important. I want to have your goals, your concerns, and your priorities in mind before I do anything else. What would you like me to keep in mind when I'm taking on the Radical Democrats? Paid for by TEAM SCALISE, a joint fundraising committee authorized by and to benefit SCALISE FOR CONGRESS and EYE OF THE TIGER PAC. Team Scalise is committed to defending our Conservative House majority and electing Conservatives across the country. Thank you for being a part of our movement. Contributions to TEAM SCALISE, or any participating committee, are not deductible as charitable contributions for federal income tax purposes. Contributions from corporations, national banks, labor unions, foreign nationals without 'green cards', and federal government contractors are prohibited. Federal law requires us to use our best efforts to collect and report the name, mailing address, occupation, and employer of each individual who contributes over $200 in a calendar year.

clean_body: Folks, when it rains, it pours: FIRST: Early voting results showed Republican turnout SOARING in Nevada, putting us on track to lose our state, the Senate, and the White House. THEN: Trump unleashed a new wave of attacks against Jacky Rosen and planned a massive MAGA rally with Jacky’s extreme opponent to shore up support and seal the deal in Nevada. NOW: The biggest super PAC for Senate Republicans is spending over $6MILLION in Nevada in just the final days of this race to blindside Jacky Rosen’s campaign and pummel her with deceptive attack ads in the final stretch of the election. We’re already walking a tightrope, and this new GOP ad buy is throwing us completely off balance. Polling already shows Jacky Rosen losing ground to her Trump-endorsed opponent, and we need to take immediate action or we could fall into too deep of a hole to climb out of before Election Day. Please, if we don’t respond TODAY, these ads could wreck months of hard work right when we need our momentum the most. We need to raise AT LEAST $250,000 today to fend off this Republican ad blitz. Can we count on your support RIGHT NOW to help us keep Nevada, the Senate, and the White House away from the hands of MAGA extremists? clean_body: Hi, friend, Sherrod here. I know it's early, so this'll be quick. I just heard from my team that we missed last night's end-of-month fundraising goal, so we extended our deadline by 24 hours. We urgently need to close this budget gap or we'll be at a serious disadvantage – especially compared to our rich, self-funding MAGA opponent and the special interest money pouring into Ohio. Recent polls show me down 1 point – so I'm reaching out to this grassroots team for help. This is urgent, friend: Will you please chip in $5 to help us reach our urgent fundraising goal, win here in Ohio, and save the Senate? Fellow American,
We are in the 7 DAYS that will determine the future of America. That's why Turning Point Action is going ALL OUT to CHASE 500,000+ BALLOTS ... to recruit and train EVEN MORE patriotic volunteers to chase EVEN MORE ballots ... and to sprint through the finish line of November 5th.
Fellow American, will you make your most generous 2X gift of $20.24, $50, $100, $250, or even $500 to support Turning Point Action's 7 DAYS to SAVE AMERICA?
Because this FINAL PUSH is so critically important, a special supporter will MATCH every dollar you give, up to $47,000 total, by MIDNIGHT on November 4. 
Make your 2X gift for 7 DAYS to SAVE AMERICA >> 
Thanks to generous patriots like YOU, Turning Point Action built the FIRST and BIGGEST ballot-chasing operation on the Right: CHASE THE VOTE. Now -- in these 7 DAYS to SAVE AMERICA -- it's time to go ALL OUT to CHASE THE VOTE and WIN BIG! 
Your gift today will help Turning Point Action:
* do ALL WE CAN with Turning Point Action's FULL-TIME BALLOT CHASERS so we chase 500,000+ BALLOTS in the MUST-WIN PRECINCTS that could determine the 2024 Election,
* train our LAST of PATRIOTIC VOLUNTEERS to help CHASE THE VOTE, as we ask volunteers to CHASE 100 VOTES during early voting and CHASE 100 VOTES on Election Day,
and * go ALL OUT so we know that we did EVERYTHING we could to CHASE THE VOTE, WIN BIG, and SAVE AMERICA! 
Will you make your 2X gift of $20.24, $50, $100, or $250 to help Turning Point Action CHASE THE VOTE during these 7 DAYS to SAVE AMERICA? 
Your gift before MIDNIGHT on Monday, November 4 will have TWICE the impact and go TWICE as far, thanks to a special Turning Point Action supporter who will match every dollar up to $47,000 total. Make your 2X gift for 7 DAYS to SAVE AMERICA >> 
I promised you that no one would work harder or do more to SAVE AMERICA this year than Turning Point Action. And during these 7 DAYS to SAVE AMERICA, our team is working around the clock to deliver on that promise. 
To stand with Turning Point Action, please make your most generous 2X gift right away. Thank YOU for everything you're doing for our country's future in this all-important year. 
Onward! 
Charlie Kirk 
Founder 
Turning Point Action

clean_body: Morning, Peter! Before I start my day, I wanted to reach out personally while I finished my coffee. But honestly, I barely slept a wink last night — because my race could determine not only the Senate majority but also whether Rick Scott becomes the majority leader. And while I'm only down by ONE POINT against Rick in the polls, he's still outspending me nearly 3-1 on Florida's airwaves. The only way I'll break away from him in the polls is with the grassroots support of 18 more Democrats in 18,326 to reach my $500,000 daily fundraising goal. Will you please chip in $25 between me and Defeat Boebert PAC now to help me flip Florida and keep the Senate blue? Fellow patriot,

Biden thinks you’re “garbage” – but Sherrod Brown and his supporters think
you’re worse... This is one of the biggest elitist bankrollers of Sherrod
Brown, Kamala Harris, and the DNC. This is who Sherrod is beholden to and who
he has to comply with in order to continue having his campaign war chest
padded.

Brown, Harris, and the radical left have shown us their true colors.
They think those of us who disagree with them –half the country – are
deplorable, Nazi garbage... and worse! It’s time to put an end to their
hateful and destructive hold on our nation. We need to fight fiercer than ever
until this is over.

Can you chip in another $10 today to keep our campaign cruising on the path to victory? For American Greatness! Bernie Moreno GOPNominee for Senate, Ohio Meet Bernie Moreno: Bernie Moreno fights for theAmerican Dream because he’s lived it. Bernie was born in Bogota, Colombia.
At age five, his American Dream began when he moved to the United States with
his family. Bernie became an American citizen at age 18.
Through his relentless work ethic and untamable entrepreneurial spirit,
he turned the first car dealership that he purchased in 2005 into one of the
largest dealership groups in America. In 2016, Bernie recognized the value
and transformational potential of blockchain technology, before it received
mainstream attention, and moved much of his volunteer time and investment
dollars into the space. In 2018 he co-founded ChampTitles, which grew to be quite successful as Bernieserved as Chairman of the Board. After a long, successful career, Bernie sold
most of his business to begin focusing on his calling: protecting the American
dream for another generation.

Solving our country’s problems requires commonsense. In Washington,
Bernie will fight to shrink government, protect our freedoms, stop the Chinese Communist party from taking our data and land,
and always put America First. Ohioans are done with politicians who talk a big game
and do nothing. Bernie wants to go to D.C. to get work done – just like healways has.

clean_body:
Hello,

The system is rigged. We all know it. The only people who can afford to runfor Senate full-time are millionaires like my opponent, Republican DebFischer. That’s why they’re the only people who ever win. It’s why theSenateis just another country club full of Ivy League graduates, former businessexecs, and trust fund babies.

Working people like me, we can’t afford to take a salary from our campaign. Not a big one. Just enough to replacethe $48,000 I got paid last year and the cost of health care for me and myfamily. Politics shouldn’t only be for the rich, and this is the only way wecan change that. Five brand-new polls show me narrowly LEADING my opponent,Republican Deb Fischer – and according to FiveThirtyEight, this is now theCLOSEST Senate race in the country.

With support from grassroots donors like you, we out-raised Fischer, but Mitch McConnell is spending over $13.1 millionon TV ads attacking me. Together, we are charting the path for how a bluecollar, union worker can run for U.S. Senate – and win. But I need grassrootsdonors like you to chip in to my campaign right now if we’re going to defeatRepublican Deb Fischer and flip this Senate seat: Please, will you make adonation to my campaign right now – no amount you can afford is too small – tohelp me defeat Republican Deb Fischer and flip this Senate seat in November?

But this race will determine who controls the House, so we can’t take anything for granted. Mike Lawler and his allies are continuing to pour money into this race. They’re flooding the airwaves with misleading ads and smears, all aimed at attacking me and distorting my record. We need to ensure we have the resources to continue fighting back until the very end. clean_body:
Friend,

I’ve got about half a century of politics under my belt, so you can trust me when I say this: Rick Scott poses one of the single greatest threats to our democracy and everything that we Democrats care about — full stop. Now I’m known for making some pretty bold statements, but this is no exaggeration: Rick Scott is pushing an agenda so extreme, even Mitch McConnell wants nothing to do with it.

I’m talking about ending Social Security and Medicare, raising taxes on working families, a national ban on abortions, and so much more. I’m scared half to death thinking about what could happen if we give this guy 6 more years in Washington — especially with MAGA extremists on the cusp of retaking the Senate.

But right now, Democrat Debbie Mucarsel-Powell is falling dangerously short of her LAST $4 million fundraising goal ahead of Election Day.

I’m asking you to take the gloves off and go on the offensive with me: Please, will you donate $5 or more to help Debbie flip Florida blue and save our Senate majority? https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2463-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Listen, just about anyone can see that a blue wave is building in Florida. As folks from all across the state rally behind Debbie’s campaign, polling data shows that this race against extremist Rick Scott is a dead heat. And that barely scratches the surface: Even with the extreme abortion ban officially in effect, Florida Democrats secured a reproductive rights ballot initiative this November and won a critical special election, flipping a pivotal state House district from red to blue. That’s why Democratic leaders like my friend Chuck Schumer, and even President Biden, are all in on Florida this year.

They’ve announced HUGE investments to make sure that voters learn the truth about Rick Scott’s record. This state is ready to flip blue — but we’ve all got to have Debbie’s back in this fight. So I’m asking one final time: PLEASE, will you donate $5 or as much as you can spare right now to make sure that Debbie has everything that she needs to take on Rick Scott and defeat him? https://secure.actblue.com/donate/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2463-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250

Thank you for taking the time to read this email.
Debbie can win, but only if folks like you believe in her and invest in her campaign.
James Carville

clean_body: Peter, I'm going to be blunt: I need you to chip in five bucks. We have to raise $500,000 every single day to keep up with Ted Cruz and his wealthy extremist donors. I simply can't do that without your help. Will you please split a $5 donation between my campaign and Defeat Boebert PAC to help defeat Ted Cruz and protect our Democratic Senate majority CHIP IN $5 If we win this race, I will work in the Senate to prevent a national abortion ban, protect our democracy, and fight against attacks on Social Security and Medicare. And polls show we can win – three in a row have me statistically tied with Ted Cruz. But I'm not taking corporate PAC money like he is. I'm relying on grassroots donors like you to power my campaign, which means we have to hit every single goal. Today we're falling $361,322 short, which is why I'm humbly asking, one more time: Will you please chip in a split donation of $5 between my campaign and Defeat Boebert PAC? CHIP IN $5 Thanks so much, Colin.

clean_body: We need to keep our ads on the air, Peter. So is there anything I can say to convince you to chip in $25 to split between my campaign and Letitia James' before our critical midnight deadline? What if I told you my MAGA opponent is a self-funding millionaire trying to buy this seat and flip the Senate red – and he raised hundreds of thousands of dollars at a fancy Mar-a-Lago fundraiser? And what if I told you Mitch McConnell-aligned super PACs made their largest ad reservation EVER – so we're officially being outspent on TV? I know a lot is happening, but here's the good news: With enough grassroots support from folks like you, I know we can win. I know we can keep our TV ads on the air, reach voters across Ohio, and protect our Senate majority. So, what do you say, Peter? Can I count on you? clean_body: Peter -- Join us for a fun night watching the election results together at the OKGOP Election Night Watch Party! Must RSVP to attend by clicking here When: Tuesday, November 5th Starting: 6:00 pm Where: Champion Convention Center -(Behind the Hilton Garden Inn Hotel) 737 S Meridian Ave, Oklahoma City, OK 73108 Welcome to the OKGOP Election Night Watch Party! Join us on Tuesday, Nov. 5, 2024 at 6:00 PM at the Champion Convention Center for a night of excitement and anticipation as we watch the election results roll in. Come mingle with fellow party members, enjoy the live band, and cheer on your favorite candidates. The Republican Women's Club of Central Oklahoma will be doing a 50/50 drawing and there will be door prizes. There will be a hot dog vendor and cash bar, as well several Elected Officials will be there to make brief remarks. It's going to be a night to remember, so don't miss out!

Tammy’s made it clear, she’s not in it for thepeople of Wisconsin or America! She’s in it for herself. We have just 4 daysleft in this TOSS-UP race to flip Wisconsin red. Democrat special interestgroups are racing millions into Wisconsin to protect their closest ally in theSenate. I’m relying on grassroots donors like you Fellow Conservative to powerus to victory in these final days. Donate $10, $50, or more to FIRE TAMMYBALDWIN. DONATE $10 >> DONATE $50 >> DONATE MORE >> Sincerely, Eric HovdeRepublican for U.S. Senate FLIP THE SENATE DONATE NOW MEET ERIC Eric's afourth-generation Wisconsinite, born and raised in the Madison area. He's aserial entrepreneur. He founded and managed his first business in his twentiesand then went on to start and build many others. When he is not running hisbusinesses, he is focused on his family and his philanthropic endeavors. Heand his brother Steve operate 10 Hovde Homes around the world that provideshelter, supportive services and love to vulnerable children. Join CONTRIBUTEMONTHLY Join the Conversation: Unsubscribe Paid for by Hovde for Wisconsin

Our country is the greatest democratic system of representative government ever created. But in order to preserve our Republic, each of us has an important role to play.

Below is information on how to exercise your right to vote. If you have any questions about voting, I’ve included links for the election offices for each county in our district.

If you need any assistance, please don’t hesitate to contact me.

Monterey County(https://www.countyofmonterey.gov/government/departments-a-h/elections/home/)
San Benito County (https://www.sanbenitocounty-ca-cre.gov/elections)
Santa Clara County (https://vote.santaclaracounty.gov/home)
Santa Cruz County(https://votescount.santacruzcountyca.gov/Home/Elections.aspx)

This year we have a historic chance to make big changes in our government. But first we all must vote for those changes.

Your vote really matters. Help us get the word out - tell your friends, consider donating to my campaign, vote by November 5th!

Regards,
Peter Hernandez

clean_body: Peter, I’m absolutely amazed by the overwhelming support you’ve shown to my team and me since launching this campaign. I just wanted to take a second to thank you from the bottom of my heart for your continued support. Over the course of this campaign, we’ve built an incredible network of grassroots supporters united behind three simple but powerful values: freedom, democracy, and fairness. Election Day is next Tuesday, and I need your help to finish the job. This is our last weekend to spread our message and turn out the voters we need to keep this seat out of the hands of MAGA extremists and secure a Democratic majority in the People’s House! If you’re with me, Peter, can I count on you to chip in anything you can to help fully fund our critical GOTV efforts in this final stretch? CONTRIBUTE(https://secure.actblue.com/donate/blu-good-q4-2024-em?refcode=BLU_EM_GOOD_2024-11-01_1&amount;=25) With gratitude, Maggie Goodlander

With Trump and congressional Republicans battling razor-thin margins in their bid to retake control of Congress and the White House, one would expect them to tread carefully. clean_body: Ken Burns sitting on chair with American flag in background Hello Peter, it’sKen Burns. I’ve dedicated my life to telling America’s stories through film.Oftentimes, those stories aren’t easy. They examine moments of our country incrisis and threats to our democracy. So, I can confidently say our country isat a crossroads, and this is the most consequential election of our lives. Weare the stewards of our republic, and now more than ever, our democraticvalues are at stake. That’s why I’m reaching out today. The fate of ourDemocratic Senate majority—and all the progress that comes with it—hinges onJon Tester and what happens in Montana. It’s finally November, and we are just days away from determining the future of our nation at the ballot box. Everything we’ve worked toward comes down to these final moments — and I want to take a moment to say thank you for standing with me every step of the way. This journey has been full of challenges and hard work — from mobilizing voters and supporting Democratic candidates here in California and the rest of the country to the attacks from Trump and his MAGA allies. Through it all, I’ve been inspired by the way this team has rallied behind me and the issues that matter most to them and their families. Your unwavering support has made all of this possible — and now we’re just days away from the finish line. We have the opportunity to keep the Senate blue, flip the House, and ensure we can move forward together — every conversation, every volunteer, every dollar raised, and every vote counts in this work. It’s not just about what we’re fighting against — it’s about what we’re fighting for. So let’s make sure every voter knows what’s at stake and how much better our future can be. Thank you again for everything you’ve done so far. With your continued support, I know we’ll finish strong and win this race. All my best, Adam P.S. If you’d like to support us in this final stretch, you can chip in here.

clean_body: It’s November 1st, y’all, which means we’re in the final stretch of one of themost critical elections in modern history. I want to take a moment to remindyou — this isn’t just another battle between Democrats and Republicans. It’s afight to protect a fundamental value that unites us all: Freedom. 💗 Thefreedom to love who you love. 🏥 The freedom to make decisions about your ownhealthcare. 🗳️ The freedom to cast your vote without unnecessary obstacles. ❌The freedom to live without fear of gun violence. I’ve fought for thesefreedoms every day in the state legislature, and I’m ready to take that fightto the U.S. Senate. But Marsha Blackburn and her special-interest allies aredoing everything they can to hold onto this seat and keep it working for therich and powerful. With only 4 days left, my team has set one final goal toclose this campaign in full force — $100,000. Every dollar goes straighttoward reaching voters, keeping our ads on the air, and making sure we leavenothing on the table in these final days. If everyone reading this chips injust a few dollars, we’ll be one step closer to victory on November 5th. Can Icount on you? clean_body:
It’s clear that the GOP wants to stoke fear about LGBTQ+ Americans in hopes these anti-gay, anti-trans messages will win out with voters and implement a red wave on November 5. But we have to push back against their dangerous, baseless narratives. Will you chip in $5 or more today to Blue Amp Action so we can support Democratic candidates who will protect LGBTQ+ rights and make sure that MAGA Republicans can’t use their power to harm marginalized groups?

**Republicans are going mask off about** their desire to see protections for LGBTQ+ people stripped away. Project 2025 – which will no doubt serve as the blueprint for a Trump presidency – calls for eliminating sexual orientation and gender identity as protected classes which leaves LGBTQ+ people without a legal safeguard from discrimination. We can’t let far-right hardliners win on Tuesday and implement their dangerous Project 2025 agenda – but we’re running out of time to guarantee Democrats will win big and keep LGBTQ+ rights SAFE. So please, Peter, can we count on you to make a gift to Blue Amp Action today so we can invest in Democrats before it’s too late?

Thank you. - Blue Amp Action -
---

|| | |  --- || | | About BlueAmp Action: We cannot sugarcoat the current situation. Right-wing authoritarianism, defeated by a worldwide coalition during WWII, was only in hibernation. Over the past decade it has infected democratic societies--including ours. It is as simple as it is terrifying: What we do now will define the future of our country and world. We at Blue Amp Action are dedicated to liberal, open societies, where reason and science are applied to solve our problems; where civil rights--including voting rights!--are protected for all. We fight for these values every day. Speaking up on our platforms, raising the voices and the political prospects of liberal pols and pundits. **And savvy grassroots activists like you know, just like we do, that we can’t stop watching the people we help elect:_ after the elections, we have to keep organizing support for the policies we like and pushing back against the ones we don’t._** **__When the public tunes out between elections and the only people our elected officials hear from are the paid lobbyists of wealthy corporations, our government stops being accountable to the needs of ordinary families.__** **Democracy never sleeps, and neither can we.** So we ask that you support our work, so we can continue to engage in this fight every moment of every day. So our kids grow up in democracy, not dystopia. Thank you for your support for all we do! Please follow Cliff Schecter on Twitter @cliffschecter, or subscribe to The Takedown with Cliff Schecter on YouTube, to keep up to date with this battle for the heart and soul of our country. — _You're getting this message because you’ve supported good causes and Democratic candidates. We need your support to continue fighting for our democracy. We love having you in our network, but if you no longer wish to hear from us, you canunsubscribe here._ --- | Paid for by Blue Amp Action PAC --- | || Unsubscribe or Manage Your Preferences ---

clean_body: Peter, I didn’t expect this to happen. I thought we’d meet our final fundraising goal, but I just got off the phone with my Finance Director, who told me we’re $4k short of where we need to be. The good news is that we still have a few hours before we report our numbers, so we still have time to make up the difference. It’s only $4,000 in an election when millions of dollars are spent, but every dollar counts in a race like this one. RUSH SUPPORT Thank you, Josh Hawley

clean_body: Peter, After a new poll showed Democratic nominee Trisha Calvarese can defeat Lauren Boebert in November, we set a goal to raise another $100,000 before our midnight fundraising deadline so we can finally send Boebert packing and turn this House seat blue. **But we just refreshed our ActBlue, and it looks like we still have $12,830 left to raise to hit our goal and ensure we have what we need to win.** **It’s not an insurmountable gap, but we’re counting on you to make a donation right now if we’re going to hit our goal, defeat Lauren Boebert, and flip this House seat blue.** Lauren Boebert and her Super PACs have raised millions to try to stop us from winning. The only way Trisha can fight back and finally put an end to Boebert’s embarrassing political “career” is with support from grassroots donors like you now. In 2022, Lauren Boebert only won by 546 votes. It was the closest race in the entire country. So we need grassroots donors like you to give every dollar you can spare now if Democratic nominee Trisha Calvarese is going to beat Boebert and take back the House for Democrats. **This seat could be the difference between taking back the House or letting Republicans stay in control. But Trisha’s not taking a dime from corporate PACs, so we’ve got nowhere else to turn:** **Please, will you make a donation now – every single dollar you can afford – to help Trisha Calvarese defeat Lauren Boebert, turn this seat blue, and take back the House for Democrats?** _Please use the links in this email to start a monthly donation through ActBlue:_ | | | **DONATE $10** ---  | **DONATE $25** ---  | | **DONATE $35** ---  | **DONATE $50** ---  | | **DONATE $100** ---  | **Other Amount** ---  We’re so grateful that you’re a part of this campaign.Thank you,Team Trisha  ********Paid for by Trisha 4 ColoradoTrisha 4 Colorado PO Box 630633 Highlands Ranch, CO 80130Contributions or gifts to Trisha 4 Colorado are not tax deductible.This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. clean_body: In the battle for the Senate, Maryland is THE winner-take-all race that will determine control. If we defeat Republican Larry Hogan, we give ourselves our best possible shot at defending our narrow Democratic Senate majority. But the flipside of that coin is super PACs and corporate billionaires buying this Senate seat for Larry Hogan, and well, that’s game over. This race is neck-and-neck, which makes your involvement that much more important, Peter. We’ve beaten the odds before and with your help, we’re going to do it again in just 4 days. Will you step up and chip in $25 right now to win the race that will decide Senate control so we can finally restore abortion rights, combat the climate crisis, and lower costs for Maryland families? If you’ve saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately. Chip in $25 Chip in $50 Chip in $100 Chip in $100 Chip in $200 Chip in $200 Chip in $250 Other Amount The brutal truth is that we don’t stand a chance of defending our Democratic majority without winning in Maryland, Peter. I’m not trying to be a downer, that’s just reality. But with your help, we can fend off a GOP takeover in the Senate, and give Kamala Harris and Tim Walz a working Senate majority on Day 1 of their administration. Maryland will determine Senate control, and there’s too much at stake to take our foot off the gas now. Can you pitch in $25 (or whatever fits your budget) right now to defeat Larry Hogan, hold Maryland blue, and keep the Senate in Democrats’ hands? If you’ve saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately. Chip in $25 Chip in $50 Chip in $100 Chip in $200 Chip in $200 Chip in $250 Other Amount Thank you, Peter — we’re only in a position to win on Tuesday because of support from grassroots champions like you. clean_body: Marist College Poll Debbie Mucarsel-Powell: 48% Rick Scott: 50% Democrats are within striking distance in Florida! With Chuck Schumer sending money to Debbie Mucarsel-Powell, we need all hands on deck to defend Rick Scott. If we lose Florida, we lose all hope of taking back a Republican Senate Majority. We need you to step up. clean_body: Leaders We Deserve We’ve been running a marathon and the finish line is rightthere, Peter! As we head into the final days before Election Day, I wanted totake a breath and thank you for showing up when it mattered most. Thanks tosupporters like you stepping up during our final end-of-month deadline, our 13endorsed candidates have a fighting chance in this election. That's 13 youngleaders fighting for climate action, protecting our fundamental rights, andbringing fresh energy to the halls of power. This is so much bigger than justhitting a fundraising goal. Every dollar you helped raise is powering doorknocks, phone calls, and direct voter outreach in these critical final days.Our candidates are out there right now, having conversations that change mindsand win votes – and that's because of you. The next five days will determineso much about our future. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/lwd-em-20241101-1?refcode=em20241101-1398&amount;=5&refcode2;=1398_587540_s8Vq4C]Will you commit to making a gift of $5 ahead of Election Day to help us winbig?? Your support will ensure that our candidates head into Election Daystronger than ever, ready to prove that young people belong at every level ofgovernment. Thank you for being part of this movement, Peter. Thank you forbelieving in young leadership. And thank you for giving everything you can tomake sure we finish strong. Let's make history on Tuesday. David Hogg LeadersWe Deserve This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. Email is a criticalway we communicate with grassroots supporters like you. clean_body: Our borders won’t be secured, inflation won’t godown, communities won’t get safer, and government overreach won’t be reeledin. I’m worried you’re sleeping on this, fellow American. Democrats have beenleading in the Generic Congressional Ballot for three months now, meaning moreAmericans would rather send a Democrat to represent them in Congress than aRepublican. We can take back the White House and the Senate, but if we losethe House – which we only hold by a handful of seats –we can’t get anythingdone. Our borders won’t be secured, inflation won’t go down, communities won’tget safer, and government overreach won’t be reeled in. That’s why yoursupport for Republican victories in target battleground seats is so critical.We can’t miss out on real chances to flip vulnerable Democrat-held seats likethis one in CA-9. SEND A MARINE TO CONGRESS ➞ I’m fighting tooth and naildown the home stretch, and I need your help to close the deal. As a MarineCorps veteran, former pastor, and current Mayor, I’m ready to bring serviceand leadership to Congress to get our country back on track. But I need yourhelp. Don’t sleep on this. Flip this seat, protect our Republican HouseMajority, and secure the future of our country by chipping in to support mycampaign today. For America, Kevin Lincoln Veteran, USMC SEND A MARINE TOCONGRESS ➞ Meet Kevin Lincoln My name is Kevin Lincoln, and my story, is theValley’s story. I am a 3rd generation Stocktonian, raising a 4th generation inthe city I love. I’m the grandson of Mexican immigrants, and my stepfather isan Army veteran. Like many Stocktonians, my family has overcome economicsetbacks. My own father struggled to survive on these streets, and was at onetime, homeless. But I never let adversity define me. I joined the Marines andserved in the White House Military Office, assigned to Marine One. I graduatedcollege while working full-time and raising a family. I’ve worked in corporateAmerica and served our community as a pastor, and as a non-profit leader. I’mblessed with a beautiful wife, Bonnie, and two amazing children. I’ve lived alife of service, but the greatest honor of my life has been giving back to mycommunity, through serving as Mayor of my hometown, Stockton. SEND A MARINE TOCONGRESS ➞ Like, Follow, and Subscribe! Kevin Lincoln is a former member ofthe U.S. Marine Corps. Use of his military rank, job titles, and photographsin uniform does not imply endorsement by the Marine Corps or the Department ofDefense. PAID FOR BY KEVIN LINCOLN FOR CONGRESS We'd hate to see you go but ifyou'd like to unsubscribe, click here.

clean_body: Peter, I am FUMING— I need Democrats to WAKE UP and take a look at what’shappening in Montana!! Mitch McConnell has handpicked a candidate to runagainst Jon Tester. Tim Sheehy is nothing but a wannabe cowboy who lies almostas much as he breathes. He’s a snake and we can’t trust him. Jon Tester is athird-generation dirt farmer with a proven track record of winning toughfights and trust me, he’ll do anything to deliver results for the folks backhome. But here’s what’s got me F*@%ING TERRIFIED: McConnell is slinging mud tothe tune of $90 MILLION. His slimy attacks against Jon are working and now thepolls are tightening. committee: Jocelyn Benson for Secretary of State
clean_body:
Friend,

I can count the days left on one hand! I’ve been driving around thestate, checking in on operations county by county. Tuesday’s somewhat ofa Super Bowl for secretaries of state like me. I couldn’t be more excited toseeMichiganders make their voices heard.

Free and Fair Elections:Improvements Under Sec. Jocelyn Benson 🖥️ Modernized Voter Registration:Implemented online and automatic voter registration, plus same-dayregistration on Election Day. 👥 Recruited 30,000 New Election Workers: A newgeneration of poll workers is ready to assist you at the polls. 📮 InstalledSecure Drop Boxes: Over 1,000 secure drop boxes are available statewide forconvenient and safe ballot returns. 🏠 Enabled Voting from Home: Every voterhas the right to vote by absentee ballot, making it easy to vote fromthe comfort of your home. ✉️ Mailed Absentee Ballot Applications: We sent absenteeballot applications to all registered voters to remind them of voting options.
🌐 Launched Online Absentee Applications: You caneasily download and submitabsentee ballot applications online. 📣 Engaged Underrepresented Voters: We’velaunched programs to increase voter participation in areas with historicallylow turnout. 🔍 Conducted Comprehensive Election Audits: We'veworked diligently to affirm the integrity and accuracy of our elections.
I’m so proudof all we’ve accomplished together since my election in 2018. But this comingTuesday isn’t about me or the Secretary of State’s office. It’s about you!Now, I want you to take a moment to think about your vote in this election.
Already voted? Think of three friends or family members. Send them a quicktext and ask, “Have you voted already? If not, do you have a plan to vote?”You can always refer them to Michigan.gov/Vote if they need help.
Haven’tvoted yet? Take just two minutes to write down your plan. When are youvoting? Do you know how you’re getting there? And, do you know where to go?Learn moreat IWillVote.com Your voice matters, and your participation is whatmakes ourdemocracy strong. Together, we can ensure that every vote is counted andeveryvoice is heard. Democracy is a beautiful thing—thank you for being apart ofit.
All my best,
Jocelyn Benson Michigan Secretary of State Paid for by Jocelyn Benson for Secretary of State Mailing Address: PO BOX 21368, Detroit, MI 48221.

clean_body:
We're losing crucial ground in Nevada at the worst possible moment, friend:
Recent poll now shows me TIED with my MAGA opponent.
Here's what you need to know:

* Donald Trump's campaign just held their 11th rally in Nevada to rile up his MAGA base around flipping Nevada red – and the Senate along with it.
* A Mitch McConnell-aligned super PAC just announced another $6.2 MILLION dollars to drown us out on the airwaves in the final days of this race – and early voting numbers show us getting absolutely dominated by Republicans.
* We're about to fall short of the $250,000 we need to raise by midnight to counter the GOP's attacks and reach the voters it will take to win between now and Election Day. Election Day is nearly here, and we're running out of time to secure the lead in this must-win race. If we don't close this fundraising gap in time, I'm worried we'll lose here in Nevada – and lose our Senate majority.
So please, I'm counting on you to rush $5 or more right now – every dollar you can spare – to help me keep Nevada blue. Our Senate majority and our path to the White House hinge on this race.
Thank you so much, Jacky

And I need your help to put this NIGHTMARE SCENARIO to bed. A MASSIVE TRUMP WIN would all but guarantee Republican victories up and down the ballot. clean_body: My team tells me we need to collect 236 more gifts from communities like Cresco to get back on track to win. Can you please use this link or one of the buttons below to make your first donation of $47 -- or even $94 -- by midnight? We have _four_ days to get this done. _Four_ days to reach and win every last voter. _Four_ days to pay for ads and organizers in swing states. _Four_ days to show Donald Trump exactly who we are. I do not want any of us to wake up the day after the election and have regrets about what we could have done in these final four days. The choice is in your hands, Peter. **Before you scroll away, here is my personal donation link one last time. View it in your web browser --- | | |  --- | | | About BlueAmp Action: We cannot sugarcoat the current situation. Right-wing authoritarianism, defeated by a worldwide coalition during WWII, was only in hibernation. Over the past decade it has infected democratic societies--including ours. It is as simple as it is terrifying: What we do now will define the future of our country and world. We at Blue Amp Action are dedicated to liberal, open societies, where reason and science are applied to solve our problems; where civil rights--including voting rights!--are protected for all. We fight for these values every day. Speaking up on our platforms, raising the voices and the political prospects of liberal pols and pundits. **And savvy grassroots activists like you know, just like we do, that we can’t stop watching the people we help elect:_ after the elections, we have to keep organizing support for the policies we like and pushing back against the ones we don’t._** **__When the public tunes out between elections and the only people our elected officials hear from are the paid lobbyists of wealthy corporations, our government stops being accountable to the needs of ordinary families.__** **Democracy never sleeps, and neither can we.** So we ask that you support our work, so we can continue to engage in this fight every moment of every day. So our kids grow up in democracy, not dystopia. Thank you for your support for all we do! Please follow Cliff Schecter on Twitter @cliffschecter, or subscribe to The Takedown with Cliff Schecter on YouTube, to keep up to date with this battle for the heart and soul of our country. — _You're getting this message because you’ve supported good causes and Democratic candidates. I know I've got what it takes to win on Tuesday, especially with such a strong grassroots movement behind me. But I need to be honest: We fell short of our end-of-month goal yesterday – and worse, I'm locked in a statistical TIE with my MAGA opponent, Bernie Moreno. clean_body:
I am no stranger to unlikely journeys.
Where I grew up in the Bay, you either live in the hills or the flatlands. We lived in the flats. It was a working-class neighborhood of firefighters, nurses, and construction workers. I grew up immersed in the ideals of the civil rights movement, and at a young age I decided I wanted to be a lawyer. I wanted to protect people because I believe everyone has a right to safety, dignity, and justice. Today, my decision to run for president has everything to do with this opportunity to move past the bitterness, cynicism, and divisive battles of the past. We have the chance to chart a new way forward – not as members of any one party or faction, but as Americans. I want you to know that I will be a president who unites us around our highest aspirations. A president who leads and listens, who is realistic, practical, and has common sense. A president who always fights for the American people. I cannot do it alone. No one person could. It takes a team. It takes millions and millions of people coming together at once to shape the outcome of this election and elect Democrats up and down the ballot. If we are going to win this election and elect Democrats in swing districts across our country, I need you to step up and join this team. Millions of Americans have already voted, and millions more will vote on Election Day. And we need to do everything we can – and I mean everything – to reach every last voter to win the White House and elect Democrats to state legislatures across the country. 

So, with time running out to make an impact before Election Day, I am asking for your support one last time: Will you help us get out the vote over these final days by splitting $10, or whatever you can afford, between the DLCC and my campaign before our midnight deadline? Every dollar will help us reach more voters and elect Democrats in key swing districts before the polls close on Election Day. 

From the bottom of my heart: Thank you for everything. I am so proud to be on this team with you. For The People, 
Kamala Kamala Harris Vice President of the United States 
 
**DONATE »** 

 Democratic Legislative Campaign Committee 1225 Eye Street NW Suite 1250, Washington, DC 20005 Paid for by DLCC PAC. Dlcc.org. Not authorized by any candidate or candidate’s committee. 
 Contributions or gifts to DLCC PAC are not tax deductible.
 
The Democratic Legislative Campaign Committee and DLCC PAC are dedicated to winning and defending Democratic majorities in state legislatures across the country. This message was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com because you are a part of our grassroots network. Emails are a crucial way to stay in touch with our supporters. Please add us to your address book or safe senders list to ensure timely election updates. We're fighting to elect Democrats and advance a progressive vision in the states. Our success depends on grassroots donors like you. Ninety-eight percent of our donors give less than $200, and two-thirds give less than $20. To make a contribution, please click here. To unsubscribe and stop receiving emails about our efforts, please click here. --- || Sent via ActionNetwork.org. To update your email address, change your name or address, or to stop receiving emails from Democratic Legislative Campaign Committee, please click here.

Hello,

it’s Jon Tester.
I have great news you need to hear right away. My opponent is facing scandal after scandal and a brand new poll has this race tied, proving what Montanans always knew—we can win. Right now, our campaign has unprecedented momentum, and we can’t afford to waste a single second of it. If we’re able to reach more voters than my opponent and tell them the truth about his lies, I know we’ll win. But that won’t happen if you’re not with us.

So I’m turning to some of my top supporters for help: Will you split a donation now -- between my campaign and Seth Moulton -- to help us fund our last-minute ads, turn out the voters we need, and win this race in 5 days? Anything you can give makes a difference.

[http://secure.actblue.com/donate/moulton-tester]

Thanks, Jon
