clean_body: The day before the Supreme Court’s disastrous Dobbs decision, I woke up to Fox News and Lauren Boebert attacking my sister and my 81-year-old father. For decades, Dad was an OB-GYN. He delivered thousands of babies and wrote books on how to get pregnant and to navigate menopause. Dad provided women with full access to all kinds of reproductive health care, including abortions, in the years right after Roe – and he has now had to watch as women’s reproductive rights are gutted in the aftermath of Dobbs . Dad and his clinic faced many threats over the years. It’s no exaggeration to say that he put his own safety – and that of his family – at risk in order to protect the rights of women to make their own medical decisions. But I’m not sure he ever expected to see a sitting member of Congress attacking him – or my sister – in a national news outlet. It’s disgusting. These kinds of personal attacks against my family have no place in our politics and do nothing to serve the people of Western and Southern Colorado. If extremists like Lauren Boebert and my new Republican opponent want to have a conversation about reproductive rights in this country, I am more than happy to have that debate. We can talk about how I support freedom and liberty – and how they support big government intruding into the lives of women. We can talk about how they support a national ban on abortion – with no exceptions for rape, incest, or the life of the mother. And we can talk about how they are so extreme, they even want to ban the pill that’s been used by women for decades. I am willing to talk allday about the fringe view that the government should be dictating women’s medical decisions. But what I won’t accept is extremists like Lauren Boebert and Fox News attacking my father and my sister. I am incredibly proud of my father. He provided health care to women when they needed it during some of the happiest – and most devastating – moments of their lives. Beforeretirement, he would drive two hours to Planned Parenthood and help teach the next generation of health care providers, like my sister. And no one – not Fox News, and especially not extremists like Lauren Boebert or my new Republican opponent – is going to stop my family from continuing to stand up for a woman’s right to choose. We already scared off Lauren Boebert. In 2022, I came just 546 votes shy of winning this House seat. I’m ready to finish the job and replace Boebert in Congress, but these are the kinds of ugly attacks that I’m up against. Please, if you can afford to, will you give $5 or more right now to my campaign to help me win this critical House seat? Our race was the closest in the entire country in 2022. name: Adam Frisch
subject: Fox News attacked my family
body: [http://adamforcolorado.com]http://adamforcolorado.com[http://adamforcolorado.com] Hello, The day before the anniversary of theSupreme Court’s disastrous Dobbs decision, I woke up to Fox News and LaurenBoebert attacking my sister and my 81-year-old father. For decades, Dad was anOB-GYN. He delivered thousands of babies and wrote books on how to getpregnant and to navigate menopause. Dad provided women with full access to allkinds of reproductive health care, including abortions, in the years rightafter Roe – and he has now had to watch as women’s reproductive rights aregutted in the aftermath of Dobbs . Dad and his clinic faced many threats overthe years. It’s no exaggeration to say that he put his own safety – and thatof his family – at risk in order to protect the rights of women to make theirown medical decisions. But I’m not sure he ever expected to see a sittingmember of Congress attacking him – or my sister who followed in his footsteps– in a national news outlet. It’s disgusting. These kinds of personal attacksagainst my family have no place in our politics and do nothing to serve thepeople of Western and Southern Colorado. If extremists like Lauren Boebert andmy new Republican opponent want to have a conversation about reproductiverights in this country, I am more than happy to have that debate. We can talkabout how I support freedom and liberty – and how they support big governmentintruding into the lives of women. We can talk about how they support anational ban on abortion – with no exceptions for rape, incest, or the life ofthe mother. And we can talk about how they are so extreme, they even want toban the pill that’s been used by women for decades. I am willing to talk allday about the fringe view that the government should be dictating women’smedical decisions. But what I won’t accept is extremists like Lauren Boebertand Fox News attacking my father and my sister. I am incredibly proud of myfather. He provided health care to women when they needed it during some ofthe happiest – and most devastating – moments of their lives. Beforeretirement, he would drive two hours to Planned Parenthood and help teach thenext generation of health care providers, like my sister. And no one – not FoxNews, and especially not extremists like Lauren Boebert or my new Republicanopponent – is going to stop my family from continuing to stand up for awoman’s right to choose. We already scared off Lauren Boebert. In 2022, I camejust 546 votes shy of winning this House seat. I’m ready to finish the job andreplace Boebert in Congress, but these are the kinds of ugly attacks that I’mup against. Please, if you can afford to, will you give $5 or more right nowto my campaign to help me win this critical House seat? Our race was theclosest in the entire country in 2022. But I’m not taking money from corporatePACs, so I’m counting on grassroots donors like you if I’m going to win.[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email?refcode=em20241101am2-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=4b3a77f9-6198-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true]Please use the links in this email to start a monthly donation throughActBlue: DONATE $10[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email?refcode=em20241101am2-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&amount;=10&refcode2;=4b3a77f9-6198-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $25[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email?refcode=em20241101am2-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&amount;=25&refcode2;=4b3a77f9-6198-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $35[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email?refcode=em20241101am2-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&amount;=35&refcode2;=4b3a77f9-6198-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $50[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email?refcode=em20241101am2-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&amount;=50&refcode2;=4b3a77f9-6198-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]DONATE $100[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email?refcode=em20241101am2-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&recurring;=true&amount;=100&refcode2;=4b3a77f9-6198-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b]Other Amount[https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/frisch_email?refcode=em20241101am2-nd&amounts;=5%2C10%2C25%2C35%2C50%2C100%2C250&refcode2;=4b3a77f9-6198-ef11-88ce-000d3a98fa6b&recurring;=true]I knew this campaign was going to get nasty, but I never expected the otherside to go after my family. Four days. Four days are all that stand between us and victory for the sixth congressional district. After months of hard work, thousands of miles traveled, and hundreds of events we can see the finish line. But we cannot give up yet – we have so much more ground to cover as things really heat up—and we need your support to make it happen!(
Wewant to raise another $10,000 between now and Election Day. We have the opportunityto bolster our TV advertising during prime NFL and ACC football games.
More than 50% of our congressional district still has not voted. We need to do everything to make sure voters know they have a better choice. We are running a true grassroots campaign all thanks to your generosity, time, and dedication. We wouldn’t be where we are at without your help. Together, we are fighting for a better future for our community and nation. To ensure that our message reaches every corner of our congressional district, we’ve launched our billboard campaign, are releasing TV ads, and have been running radio ads left and right. Our opponent doesn’t have what it takes to represent the people of the sixth congressional district. He is a proud Trump MAGA loyalist.
My focus is revitalizing the economy, creating jobs, and ensuring fair wages and protecting workers. I support women’s right to choose, workers and their right to collectively bargain, increased funding for public schools, expanded and optimized broadband, equitable access to technology, and respect for personal privacy and healthcare choices. I am committed to transitioning to renewable energy, tackling climate change, and advocating for a diplomatic resolution to the Israeli-Palestinian conflict. My platform offers practical solutions and progressive leadership for a brighter future in Virginia’s vast, beautiful sixth congressional district.
Do you know what my opponent brings to the table?
❌ Voted against the Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act 
❌ Voted against the Infant Formula Supplemental Appropriations Act 
❌ Voted against the American Rescue Plan 
❌ Voted against the Affordable Insulin Now Act 
❌ Voted against the PAWS Act 
❌ Voted against the Ending Forced Arbitration of Sexual Assault and Sexual Harassment Act
❌ Voted against the Pregnant Workers Fairness Act 
❌ Voted against the Protecting Older Workers from Discrimination Act 
❌ Voted against the Lower Drug Costs Now Act
❌ Voted against the Equality Act As you can imagine, the list goes on and doesn’t get any better. My opponent proudly stands with a convicted felon, Marjorie Taylor Greene, Matt Gaetz, and Speaker Mike Johnson.
The sixth congressional district deserves so much better.
So, to make it to the finish line, we need your help. Every dollar counts, and with your generous support, we can make sure that our campaign is visible and impactful. Click the link below to contribute and be part of this vital effort: CLICK HERE TO DONATE NOW!(
https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ken-mitchell-for-va-1?refcode=14days)
Thank you for your continued support towards our shared vision for the future. Together, we can make sure our message is seen, heard, and acted upon! Can you donate $50, $100, or $250 dollars to help us defeat Ben Cline and reach more voters? (
https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ken-mitchell-for-va-1?refcode=14days) We should be in this fight together. Not pandering to party loyalists and being bought by large corporations. If we don’t get back to pragmatic problem solving, mutual respect, and putting country before party, our democracy will not survive. We can do better. Join me in defeating Ben Cline and bringing real representation to the sixth congressional district. —Ken Mitchell, Democratic Candidate for Virginia’s 6th Congressional District Donate Now! (
https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ken-mitchell-for-va-1?refcode=14days)

But, we do have some good news: We did the math, and we can still come back from this if we raise an emergency $4,000 today to make up for the lost ground. Ryan Busse

clean_body: Pramila Jayapal Peter, we're at a critical point in the final stretch of this campaign, and we just fell short of our email fundraising goal for October. If you take a look at this chart, you can see our online fundraising has been trending down over the past month: [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/pj-email-20241101-1?refcode=em20241101-4475amount=3&refcode2=4475_420207_GXOviJ][IMG] We need your help to close this gap and reach every last voter before polls close. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/pj-email-20241101-1?refcode=em20241101-4475amount=3&refcode2=4475_420207_GXOviJ&akid=4475%2E420207%2EGXOviJ] Will you pitch in $3 today to help? Your contributions go straight to work helping us get out the vote in Washington and swing states across the country. We’ve teamed up with the Harris-Walz campaign and made more than 50,000 calls into swing states so far, and Pramila is personally on the ground leading door-knocking teams. We’re doing this work because expanding Medicare, eliminating the filibuster to secure abortion rights, and passing paid family and medical leave all depend on electing Kamala Harris and Democratic majorities in Congress — but we can’t do it without you. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/pj-email-20241101-1?refcode=em20241101-4475amount=3&refcode2=4475_420207_GXOviJ&akid=4475%2E420207%2EGXOviJ] Can we count on you to help us regain our momentum? If everyone reading this pitches in $3, we’ll make up the difference on the goal we missed in no time. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/pj-email-20241101-1?amount=3&refcode=em20241101-4475&refcode2=4475_420207_GXOviJ&akid=4475%2E420207%2EGXOviJ] Contribute In solidarity, Jayapal HQ Contribute to Pramila Jayapal: [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/pj-email-footer?refcode=em20241101-4475-footer&t=1002&refcode2=4475_420207_GXOviJ&akid=4475%2E420207%2EGXOviJ] This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. clean_body: Today, we’re asking you to chip in $1, Peter. You might be asking yourself, “what can four quarters possibly do?” Well, here’s what your $1 can do: $1 can protect abortion rights, Social Security, and affordable health care from being dismantled by Tammy’s right-wing opponent. $1 can help defend our razor-thin Democratic majority in the Senate from Republicans and their extremist agenda. $1 can help our campaign fight back against the $100 million worth of ads Republicans and right-wing super PACs have poured into Wisconsin — turning this into the most expensive Senate race in our state’s history. We get it — $1 may not seem like it could make a difference, especially up against Republican dark money donors and a self-funding megamillionaire who has poured $20 million of his personal fortune toward flipping this seat red. But this close to Election Day in the most competitive Senate race in the country, every single dollar makes a real difference — especially when tens of thousands of supporters step up to support Tammy’s reelection campaign. clean_body: Ugh! New polling shows that Democrats have lost our lead in CA-47 and are now trailing within the margin of error . This was Katie Porter’s congressional seat, and we need to ensure we retain it if Democrats want a chance to regain control of the House of Representatives next Tuesday. With only days before Election Day, every second counts, and it’s going to be expensive to deploy more resources ASAP in this must-win seat. Sorry for being so blunt, but we could really use a donation of $ or more right now. [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-oct24?refcode=&amount;=] CHIP IN $ >> [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-oct24?&refcode;=&amount;=] CHIP IN $ >> [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-oct24?&refcode;=&amount;=] CHIP IN $ >> [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-oct24?&refcode;=&amount;=] CHIP IN $ >> [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-oct24?&refcode;=&amount;=] Aren’t sure whether this is a district worth investing in? Take a look at this polling trajectory: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-oct24?refcode=&amount= [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-oct24?refcode=&amount=] Katie Porter narrowly won this crucial swing seat in 2022, but recent polling indicates that Democrats are trailing by three points. Here’s the truth: We can still win this seat. 17% of all voters are undecided, and the polling is WELL within the margin of error. However, achieving this will require a surge of resources that we hadn’t planned for. And Democrats winning the U.S. House is going to require picking up seats in California. We can’t afford to lose a single blue seat . That all adds up to one thing. We need your help. We know so many of our supporters are getting *LOTS* of emails, and many have been generous already this election. But with control of the House Majority hanging in the balance, we can’t not ask. If you’re able, will you pitch in? [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-oct24?refcode=&amount;=] CHIP IN $ >> [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-oct24?&refcode;=&amount;=] Thank you so much. Together we will do this. - CADEM DONATE » [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/cdp-footer?refcode=&amount;=20.24] Our Democratic leaders are working hard to make California a better place to live. From fighting for good-paying jobs, combating climate change, to expanding healthcare access so all Californians can lead safe, healthy, prosperous lives — California’s Democratic leaders turn progressive ideas into meaningful action. If this email was forwarded to you, please sign up for our email list here. [https://secure.ngpvan.com/zWMh-KAhmUiJYxMzOxKADQ2] We rely on email to communicate with supporters like you and conduct the business of the California Democratic Party, but if you wish to receive only our most important emails, let us know here to sign up for fewer emails. Debbie's key lime pie recipe
https://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2454-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Friend, your support has just put me within striking distance of retiring Rick Scott, helped me pay my staff, and kept the lights on at HQ. So now, I'm sharing one of my best recipes — key lime pie — as a small way to say thank you. If you ask me, the best results come from using limes from the Florida Keys. But I can't protect the farmland or delicious produce from our little slice of paradise in the Senate without your help to close the 33% gap on my final $4 million goal before Election Day.
Will you please chip in $5 or more now to help me take the lead and flip Florida blue?

body: Debbie's key lime pie recipehttps://secure.actblue.com/contribute/page/mw_dmp_2024_email_fr?refcode=jtk2454-fr-text&amounts;=5,25,50,100,250 Friend, your support has just put me withinstriking distance of retiring Rick Scott, helped me pay my staff, and kept thelights on at HQ. clean_body: 96 November is here. Election Day is Tuesday. But you don’t have to waituntil then to vote — early voting continues until Monday at NOON! Find yourpolling location and make your plan to vote. If you’ve already voted, the workisn’t done. Make sure your friends and loved ones vote. And please talk to anyundecided voter you know about why it’s time for a change in Kansas’ 3rdDistrict. Sharice Davids has failed to do her job. She’s put her party’sinterests over your interests. We can hold her accountable at the ballot box,and then we can have new leadership in Congress. Thank you for all thecontinued support, let’s finish strong and flip this seat! In the aftermath of 9/11, he answered his country's call. Hebecame a citizen, joined the U.S. Air Force Reserve, and still serves as Lt.Colonel today. Dr. Reddy is running for Congress against a Democrat who voteswith Joe Biden 100% of the time, in one of the most competitive Housedistricts in the country. Dr. Reddy is a different kind of candidate. He's anoutsider, a problem solver, and someone who's spent his career taking action.https://secure.winred.com/reddy-for-kansas-03/hf-footer-email?utm_source=rc&utm;_medium=email&utm;_campaign=2024nov01hf Let's flip Kansas' 3rdDistrict and send an independent voice to Congress. clean_body: This October, I’ve been hitting the road to support Republicans up and down the ballot. The final campaign surge has already begun, but I’m asking you today to support our efforts to turn Virginia red. It’s not just about the presidency — it’s about the importance of electing common-sense conservative leaders up and down the ballot. We’ve got an incredible candidate for Senate. We’ve got competitive congressional districts across the Commonwealth. And we’ve got the energy on the ground to make those victories happen — if we act. Virginia isn’t just our surprise swing state this year. The roads to majorities in Congress could very well run right through Virginia. That’s why I’m mobilizing resources online and on the road to reach voters and turn Virginia red in these final days. To support these efforts, we’re running an urgent end-of-month fundraising surge to power us through Election Day. We only have DAYS left until the book closes on the 2024 election for good, so we need to act now. Friend, can I count on you to be by my side while we fight for Virginia? Please, pitch in anything you can. Thank you, Jason Miyares Virginia Attorney General WHO IS JASON MIYARES AND WHY IS HE WRITING TO ME? Jason Miyares is the Attorney General of Virginia — but his story doesn’t start in Virginia… It starts in Havana, Cuba, when his mother, Miriam Miyares, fled communist Cuba pennyless and homeless. She immigrated to Virginia and raised Jason to appreciate freedom, fairness, and justice for all. In 2015, almost fifty years to the day that she fled Cuba, Miriam was able to vote for Jason to represent her in the Virginia House of Delegates. After working as a prosecutor and serving for three terms in the state legislature, he ran and was elected the 48th Attorney General of Virginia. Since his inauguration in January 2022, Jason has been focused on fighting violent crime and improving public safety, strengthening economic growth, combatting the deadly impact of opioids and fentanyl, and protecting Virginians from corporate misconduct. He’s been fearless in standing up for the rule of law by challenging the Biden-Harris Administration whenever it tries to use lawfare to advance its radical agenda, whether it’s failing to secure the border or advancing its extreme green agenda. This year, he’s not on the ballot — but the American Miracle is. Jason Miyares is laser-focused on making sure that we win Virginia this year, and that’s why he’s writing to you today. Will you join Jason’s team and help him turn Virginia red? Paid for by Miyares for Virginia P.O. Box 26352 Alexandria, Virginia 22313 This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com Unsubscribe

subject: We need to do everything we can to make sure Bob wins
body: Jon Favreau here. If you’re way too online like me, you’ve probably seen a tonof headlines about a bunch of rich guys running for Senate in states wherethey don't even live. Connecticut mega-millionaire David McCormick is one ofthose rich guys, and he’s running against beloved Pennsylvania Senator, BobCasey. So look, this will be a very close race, and we need to do everythingwe can to make sure Bob wins — [ https://secure.actblue.com/donate/casey-em-20241101-2?refcode=em20241101-2&refcode2;=4745_552475_IPLfG2&akid;=4745%2E552475%2EIPLfG2]which is why I’m asking if you’ll contribute $5 towards his campaign today.David McCormick is a former Wall Street hedge-fund exec who wants you to thinkhe grew up on a Pennsylvania farm, which is only true if you think that livingin a mansion 10 minutes down the road from a farm where your family raisedArabian horses counts as “growing up on a farm.” But wait, Peter, there'smore: McCormick also thinks the most popular beer in Pennsylvania is called“YANG-ling,” which is like running for Senate in Massachusetts and saying youwant coffee from "DOON-kin’ Donuts." If it wasn’t obvious before, it’s crystalclear now: David McCormick is wrong for Pennsylvania. But this will be one ofthe toughest races of the year for Democrats. McCormick has millions uponmillions of dollars of his own to dump into this race, in addition to thebacking of Donald Trump and billionaire-funded super PACs. Pennsylvania is ascompetitive as it gets, and with the Senate majority and the White Housedepending on it, we can’t take anything for granted. The election is just 4 days away, and every dollar raised will help Kristen combat the attack ads from National Republicans and get out the vote in our tossup district. So Can you join me in supporting Kristen by donating right away? She’s exactly who mid-Michigan needs in Congress, but she’s counting on all of us to help her win in just 4 days. clean_body: Today is the last day to vote early in Texas! You can find early voting sites here—please share with people you know need to know. [https://teamrv-mvp.sos.texas.gov/MVP/mvp.do] https://teamrv-mvp.sos.texas.gov/MVP/mvp.do [https://teamrv-mvp.sos.texas.gov/MVP/mvp.do] There’s never been a better or more important time to help us talk with voters—many people who haven’t voted are still making up their minds about who to vote for or whether to vote at all. So, we hope you will join us for our Day of Action tomorrow, November 2,[https://www.mobilize.us/fletcherforcongress/event/678074/] when we’ll be phone-banking, block-walking, and more to get out the vote for Lizzie, Colin Allred, and Democrats up and down the ballot.[https://www.mobilize.us/fletcherforcongress/event/678074/] https://www.mobilize.us/fletcherforcongress/event/678074/[https://www.mobilize.us/fletcherforcongress/event/678074/] (Can’t make it tomorrow? We have more block walks and phone banks planned on Sunday, Monday, and Election Day! [https://www.mobilize.us/fletcherforcongress/event/678074/]) More than 3 million Texans have voted, but that’s only a fraction of the registered voters in our state! We know we have work to do to get voters out to the polls in #TX07 and across Harris and Fort Bend Counties. These counties are critical in our efforts to re-elect Lizzie and send Ted Cruz back to Cancun. We know you know the stakes in this election. Everyone needs to make a plan to vote—vote early and get others to do the same! We need as many volunteers as possible to help us knock on doors and mobilize voters. So, we hope to see you out there! clean_body: Sherrod here with some big news: After a new Morning Consult poll showed me trailing my MAGA opponent by a point, my team and I sat down and decided to launch one more final ad before Election Day. So, if you've been waiting to give $25 to split between this grassroots campaign and Fight for Progress, right now is when it will have the greatest impact. Here's why: * Ohioans are already voting, and Election Day is next week – so the sooner we can launch this final ad, the more voters we’ll be able to reach before they submit their ballots. * We’re getting drowned out on the airwaves – Republicans have outspent us 3-to-1, so this final ad will punch back at their attacks. * This final ad is going to be expensive – and we’re going to run it on as many TV stations across Ohio as possible, so the more we raise, the better the chance we have at reaching the voters we need before Election Day. So, my team and I have set an urgent goal to raise $500,000 before midnight tomorrow to help launch this ad – my last ad before Election Day. I need your help now more than ever, Peter: Please, will you rush $25 to split between my campaign and Fight for Progress now to help us get our ad on the air, win in Ohio, and keep the Senate blue? name: Sherrod Brown
subject: will you help me get my final ad on the air?
body: Hi Peter, Sherrod here with some big news: After a new Morning Consult pollshowed me trailing my MAGA opponent by a point, my team and I sat down anddecided to launch one more final ad before Election Day. So, if you've beenwaiting to give $25 to split between this grassroots campaign and Fight forProgress, right now is when it will have the greatest impact. Here's why: *Ohioans are already voting, and Election Day is next week – so the sooner wecan launch this final ad, the more voters we'll be able to reach before theysubmit their ballots. * We're getting drowned out on the airwaves –Republicans have outspent us 3-to-1, so this final ad will punch back at theirattacks. * This final ad is going to be expensive – and we're going to run iton as many TV stations across Ohio as possible, so the more we raise, thebetter the chance we have at reaching the voters we need before Election Day.So, my team and I have set an urgent goal to raise $500,000 before midnighttomorrow to help launch this ad – my last ad before Election Day. I need yourhelp now more than ever, Peter: Please, will you rush $25 to split between mycampaign and Fight for Progress now to help us get our ad on the air, win inOhio, and keep the Senate blue? clean_body:
Dear Friends,

As Election Day approaches, the choice in Virginia’s 5th District has never been clearer. My opponent has made his priorities evident by fully embracing Trump and his extreme MAGA agenda.

Meanwhile, I’m here to offer a platform rooted in unity, solutions, and the real concerns of our communities. My opponent's campaign has centered on loyalty to the former president, anti-LGBTQ+ policies, and questioning the integrity of our elections. He has called the pandemic a “plan-demic” and implied that our voting system is flawed.

This is not the leadership we need, nor is it reflective of the values that built this district. In contrast, my platform is about strengthening democracy, supporting families, and promoting smart economic growth. I believe in protecting Social Security, expanding access to healthcare, and creating vocational and educational opportunities for our young people.

These priorities are driven by my deep connection to this district and my belief in the power of community.

Let’s make sure everyone understands the stakes in this election. I need your help to spread the word about what’s truly at risk in this race. Please share this message with your friends and family, and encourage them to join us in voting for a vision of inclusion and progress for Virginia's 5th district.

Thank you for standing with me in this movement . Together, let’s create a future we can all be proud of.

With determination,
 Gloria Witt Democratic Nominee Virginia’s 5th Congressional District P.S. Please Join us for a Watch Party on Election Day!
Support Gloria, a leader who will fight for “we the people.” DONATE Stay Connected Facebook Paid for and authorized by Gloria Witt for Congress.
Gloria Witt for Congress P.O. Box 2225, Lynchburg, Virignia 24505, United States Powered by Squarespace Unsubscribe

clean_body: Hello, Fellow Republican! This is a reminder that the Indiana GOP invites you to Election Night 2024 at the JW Marriott in Indianapolis on November 5th, 2024! Join the Indiana Republican Party and our candidates on election night to watch the final results roll in! We will be joined by gubernatorial candidate Mike Braun, Attorney General Todd Rokita, Lieutenant Governor candidate Micah Beckwith, congressional candidate Jefferson Shreve, and many more candidates and elected officials! There is no cost to attend, but to RSVP, please contact: rsvp@indiana.gop. See the flyer below for more details. We will also be auctioning off an extensive collection of fine bourbons one election night! You can make your bid online using the button below, then join us for our election night party to make your final bid and pick up your bottle of bourbon! Click Here for the Bourbon Auction! Paid for by the Indiana Republican State Committee. Not authorized by any candidate or candidate's committee. www.Indiana.gop. 101 W. Ohio St., Suite 2200 Indianapolis, IN 46204

clean_body: Fellow Patriot, I’m afraid we could be at the end of the road. I don’t mean tobe too negative, but Tim Kaine has a MASSIVE war chest, and I just don’t knowif we can overcome it. This is CAPT Hung Cao. I’m not a career politician likeTim Kaine. I’m a husband, a father, and a 25-year combat Naval Captain. I’malso running for Senate in what could be the biggest political upset inVirginia’s history I’m running against a 30+ year incumbent who has spent hisentire life serving Washington's special interests. Let’s just cut to thechase: I can’t do this alone. Can you pitch in to support my campaign? PITCHIN NOW I won’t lie, this is going to be an uphill battle, but I know thatwith you on our A-Team we can win this seat and take back the Senate. Our teamis gearing up for the upset of the century, and we want YOU to be a part ofit.Please, will you pitch in now to make sure we have the resources we need towin? SAVE OUR COUNTRY My wife and I are raising our children to grow up intohonest men and women, so you can trust that I’ll keep my promise to put ourCommonwealth and our country first in everything I do. In Liberty, CAPT HungCao USN (Ret) Paid for by Hung Cao for Virginia Use of military rank, jobtitles, and photographs in uniform does not imply endorsement by theDepartment of the Navy or the Department of Defense.

clean_body: The U.N.’s Verdict on Climate Progress Over the Past Year: There Was None” -The New York Times, Oct. 24, 2024 Global climate action has stalled. The latest U.N. report shows that while fossil fuel pollution surged to a record high last year, our governments are on track to miss the goals set in the Paris Agreement by a wide margin — with warming predicted to reach 2.6–2.8°C by the century’s end. Every fraction of a degree the planet warms means deadlier heat waves, more catastrophic wildfires, and a heartbreaking loss of biodiversity. We can’t let this future become our reality — and that’s why this election matters so much. November 5th is our best shot to send a message that we won’t accept inaction from our leaders any longer. The U.S. has the power to set a global standard. If we step up, we inspire other nations to act, too. But if we fail, it becomes harder for any country to hit the targets needed to keep our planet livable. Electing climate champions who we can actually urge to act could be the turning point. With just 3 days until Election Day, we need to know: How urgent is it to you to elect climate leaders who are dedicated to following through on their climate promises? clean_body: Republicans are desperate to take back the PA House, and we need to compete against their rampant spending. | | |  --- | ![](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/097/354/original/2023_09_Email-Wrapper-Graphic_B_v2.png) |  ---|--- Our Republican counterparts dumped $6.2 million into efforts to smear our Democratic candidates and grab back power in the PA House. **Let’s put that into perspective:** * **$6,200,000** is more than it cost to repair Independence Hall in Philadelphia at the turn of the century.  * **$6,200,000** could get you over **620,000 hoagies from Wawa** or over **1,000,000 orders of tater tots at Sheetz** – two famous Pennsylvania establishments.  * **$6,200,000** is the total of **885,715 donations of $7** to the DLCC and our movement to elect state Dems. With only three days before Election Day, we’re asking: Will you make a donation of $7 (matched FIVE times!)? If a fraction of the supporters reading this email chipped in, we’d be able to compete with the GOP’s $6.2 million investment in PA and counter GOP spending in the states nationwide. | If you've stored your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will process immediately.  --- | 5X-MATCH $7 --- | 5X-MATCH $25 --- | 5X-MATCH $50 --- | 5X-MATCH $100 --- | 5X-MATCH $250 --- | OTHER » ---  Together, we can beat the GOP at the ballot box, defend control of the Pennsylvania House, and continue our work to protect our fundamental freedoms in statehouses nationwide.Thanks,Team DLCC   **5X-MATCH: ACTIVE »** **MAKE IT MONTHLY »**             | --- Paid for by the Democratic Legislative Campaign Committee, dlcc.org. Not authorized by any candidate or candidate's committee.  Contributions or gifts to DLCC are not tax deductible. | The Democratic Legislative Campaign Committee is dedicated to winning and defending Democratic majorities in state legislatures across the country. Fellow Patriot:
November 5th is just days away. This is our last chance to make a critical push before Election Day. With experts saying that we have a chance to upset Adam Schiff and seize Senate control, we need every dollar possible to fight until the end: Will you chip in right now to help power our campaign to victory? 

With Californians casting their ballots as you read this, here’s where things stand:
* We’ve been steadily rising in the polls with our strong Q2 and Q3 postings – and even stronger performance against Adam Schiff in the debate.
* We are polling at an all-time Republican high with the Latino community and gained 5% with Asian voters in just the last few weeks.

If we want to keep gaining ground during these critical final days, we need to keep up our ads targeting the remaining swing voters. And Fellow Patriot – if you could help me with a donation during this final stretch – I know it would be the final nail in the coffin for Adam Schiff’s campaign. Can I count on you?
DONATE $35 DONATE $100 DONATE $500 DONATE $50 DONATE $250 DONATE $1000DONATE $35 DONATE $50 DONATE $100 DONATE $250 DONATE $500 DONATE $1000OTHER AMOUNT
Thank you, and God bless,
DONATE <>

PAID FOR BY STEVE GARVEYFOR U.S. SENATE 
PO Box 532389
Los Angeles, CA 90053-2389

Hi Peter,
 Mark Kelly here. I'm reaching out today to ask if you can help my friend Yassamin Ansari make history in just a few days? If you don't have time to read on, you can make a contribution right here >> [http://secure.actblue.com/donate/yassaminansari_em?refcode=241102_mk_endorsement_l1] CONTRIBUTE [https://secure.actblue.com/donate/yassaminansari_em?refcode=241102_mk_endorsement] Yassamin is the Democratic nominee for AZ-03 in Phoenix. She's a former senior advisor for the United Nations and Vice Mayor of Phoenix. She has broken barriers her entire life, including becoming the first Iranian-American woman elected to public office in Arizona. Now, as the Democratic nominee for AZ-03, she's on the cusp of becoming the youngest woman in Congress and the first Iranian-American Democrat. And here's the thing, Yassamin isn't stopping at making history here in AZ-03. She and her team are working overtime to turn out Democrats across Arizona so that we can keep our state blue. Yass and her team know that if they turn out the vote here in AZ-03, we can elect Kamala Harris, Ruben Gallego, and deliver the Democratic trifecta we need to keep moving this country forward. If you're ready to make history and keep Arizona blue, please make a contribution to Yassamin's campaign today. But first, I have to ask: will you chip in to help us reach our final pre-election goal of raising $20,000 from grassroots supporters? These updates show the momentum we’ve built throughout this people-powered campaign. And I’m thankful for every single supporter who helped us get to this point. But we can’t get complacent, Peter, because here’s the bad news: We are being heavily outspent by Derrick Van Orden and his extremist, deep-pocketed allies and super PACs. committee: Paid for by Pfaff for State Senate
clean_body:
Friend, this is Sen. Brad Pfaff,reaching out one last time before Election Day arrives. District 32 might betough, but we’ve won tough races together before, Friend.
Standing for our communities is workthat never stops, Friend. When I served as WI’s Secretary of Agriculture,Trade, and Consumer Protection, Republican politicians removed me from officebecause they didn’t like the fact that I was standing up for the mental healthof family farmers— but that didn’t stop me. I ran to represent our district,won thanks to your support, and have been fighting for you ever since. I’vesponsored and supported legislation that would 1️⃣ support our family farmers2️⃣fix our roads and expand broadband access and 3️⃣ clean toxic PFASchemicals from our groundwater. And I want to keep working with you toaccomplish even more in 2025 and beyond, Friend.
So, today I’m reaching out tosay this: Friend, if you haven't made it to the polls yet, I'm asking for yourvote this November 5th. Thank you and in service, Sen. Brad Pfaff P.S. My teamand I will still be knocking on doors, making phone calls, and ensuring ourmessage gets out to every voter. Can you support our final outreach effortswith a donation of $35 or whatever you can? CHIP IN HERE>>[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/pfaff-email?refcode=20241102_em_fr_b1_BP_NGP] Brad Pfaff is a proud son of therolling hills, coulees, and valleys of northern La Crosse County where he wasraised on his family's dairy farm. clean_body:
Peter, $5. That’s the amount I am humbly asking you to give to my campaign to help me defeat Lauren Boebert. Yep, just $5.
$5 because last year, Adam Frisch lost to Lauren Boebert by just 546 votes.
$5 because now Lauren Boebert has moved to my district, and I am the Democratic nominee running against her.
$5 because the polling shows Boebert is still incredibly vulnerable and in danger of losing!
And $5 because if we turn this seat blue, Democrats are almost guaranteed to take back the House – and that’s why Lauren Boebert and Speaker Johnson’s Super PACs are attacking me.
I know $5 might not seem like much – and to be honest, it’s not. But over 75,000 grassroots donors like you have already chipped in to my campaign, and we are building a grassroots movement to defeat Lauren Boebert – $5 at a time.
We cannot stop or let up now. Not when we are so close to giving Boebert the boot.
My campaign has set a goal to raise another $30,000 to fight back and defeat Lauren Boebert, but we are still extremely far away with time running out before our critical fundraising deadline.
**Please, can I count on you to make a donation to my campaign right now – no amount is too small – to help me defeat Lauren Boebert, flip this seat blue, and take back the House for Democrats?** _Please use the links in this email to start a weekly donation through ActBlue:_ | | | **DONATE $10** ---  | **DONATE $25** ---  | | **DONATE $35** ---  | **DONATE $50** ---  | | **DONATE $100** ---  | **Other Amount** --- 
I have been so humbled by the massive outpouring of support my campaign hasgotten from people like you all across the country.But I’m not taking money from corporate PACs, so I need your continued supportnow if we’re going to win and finally defeat Lauren Boebert.
Thank you – from the bottom of my heart,
Trisha  ********Paid for by Trisha 4 ColoradoTrisha 4 Colorado PO Box 630633 Highlands Ranch, CO 80130Contributions or gifts to Trisha 4 Colorado are not tax deductible.This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com. clean_body: The education establishment has a track record of opposing anyone and everyone who wants to diversify the education system. They did it with the homeschool movement and argued parents were unfit to provide their children with a proper education. But when it came to test scores, homeschooled kids outperformed their counterparts in public education. In fact, in every state where education vouchers are available, public funding has increased, and test scores have improved… because competition works. Now, the education establishment is at it again. This time, they’re dead set on preventing education dollars from following the student, whether that’s in a public school, private school, charter school, or homeschool. THIS IS WRONG >> Peter, I truly believe education freedom is the civil rights issue of our time. STAND WITH RAND: FIGHT FOR SCHOOL CHOICE Every child, regardless of their family’s income or zip code, deserves access to the best education possible—and that starts with vouchers. Greater competition means greater results, which directly benefit our sons and daughters. At the end of the day, the school choice movement is about ensuring every child has his or her needs met, and that every child has their God-given ability to flourish and thrive. With education freedom, we can ensure that’s a reality for every child, in every state. DEMAND EDUCATION FREEDOM Peter, every day, I fight to protect our rights, freedoms, and the Constitution. Part of fighting for those rights includes ensuring parents have the freedom to choose the best education for their children. Stand with me as we address the civil rights issue of our time. DONATE $25 DONATE $50 DONATE $75 DONATE $100 DONATE ANY AMOUNT In liberty, Rand Paul Paid for by Rand Paul for Senate P.O. Box 26352 Alexandria, Virginia 22313 This email was sent to dpwillis67@gmail.com Unsubscribe Contribution rules: * I am a U.S. citizen or lawfully admitted permanent resident (i.e., green card holder). * This contribution is made from my own funds, and funds are not being provided by another person or entity for the purpose of making this contribution. * I am making this contribution with my own personal credit card and not with a corporate or business credit card or a card issued to another person. * I am at least eighteen years old. I am not, nor am I making this contribution on behalf of, a corporation, labor organization, national bank, foreign national without a green card, a federal contractor, or any other federally impermissible source.

To all of Ruben Gallego’s supporters 
We are asking you, humbly: Don’tclick away from this email. This is one of the last opportunities we have tobreak through before Election Day on Tuesday, so we’ll get straight to thepoint: We’re asking you to contribute to Ruben’s campaign before that deadlinehits. The vast majority of people who read this email won’t give; they’ll lookthe other way. We’re hoping you’re different. As a matter of fact, we need youto be different. As you read this, Ruben is being outspent on television inArizona. After months of missed goals, we haven’t raised what we need tocompete. Kari Lake has more resources at her disposal than we do, and we arefalling behind. The way we retake the momentum is you. If everyone readingthis donated just $5, we would not only fully fund our advertising in thisfinal week. We would not only receive a historic number of donations. We wouldturn this election upside down. We’d raise enough to defeat Kari Lake. UnlikeKari, Ruben can’t depend on a handful of billionaires to bail this campaignout. We’re sustained by the donations of less than 5% of Ruben’s supporters.Without those donations, big or small, we wouldn’t have a chance. That’s whywe need your help. We’re passionate about the way we fundraise becauseultimately this campaign is powered by you. But this late in the race, theonly tool we have to close the gap with Kari Lake and win is with yoursupport. If defeating Kari Lake and holding control of the U.S. Senate seemsworth a donation to you, please take a moment to secure the future of ourdemocracy by chipping in. [https://act.lucaskunce.com/go/82423?refcode=em20241102-8589&firstname;=Peter&lastname;=Willis&email;=dpwillis67@gmail.com&zip;=18326&city;=Cresco&state;=PA&amounts;=5%2C20%2C50%2C100%2C250%2C500%2C1000&t;=1001&akid;=8589%2E614464%2ExxD1RL]Please split $10 with Lucas Kunce or select an amount below. Each day they push their dangerous rhetoric and extreme policies, bringing our nation to a critical tipping point. We cannot stand by and watch. Kamala Harris is at the forefront, passionately defending our rights and the values we cherish. The battle ahead is tough, but with your immediate support, we can ensure she triumphs. This is where YOU come in. Your $3 donation can be the difference between preserving our democracy and losing it. Your contribution is more than just money — it’s a lifeline for our democracy. Together, we can:  ✅ Safeguard our democracy from Trump’s lies and deceit. ✅ Secure a Democratic majority in the Senate and reclaim the House. ✅ Elect Kamala Harris as the first woman President and continue building a fair and just America. Trump and his MAGA allies are counting on us to fail. But with you by our side, we can outshine their darkness with our collective strength. Our future is on the line. clean_body:
This is the most consequential election of our lifetime.
| | |                                                                                                                                    --- ![Harris forPresident](https://actionnetwork.org/user_files/user_files/000/111/764/original/HFP-Walz-SingleColor-HarrisBlue.png) ![Joe Biden](https://actionnetwork.org/s3_files/uploads/data/000/946/902/original/kamala_hopeful.jpg) Hi, Peter I am reaching out to ask you to make a donation to our campaign before our midnight deadline. Let me explain why:
As you read this, Trump and his right-wing allies are outspending us on ads attacking my character and values. They are running them in crucial swing states like Pennsylvania, Georgia, and North Carolina.
_States that we need to win._ I do not lose sleep over what an unhinged and unstable man thinks about me. What _does_ keep me up at night, is what is at stake in this election and the thought of undecided voters seeing his hate-fueled message before we have a chance to correct the record.
**We can and must reach these voters -- and that takes significant resources.** Peter, it looks like you are still waiting for the best moment to donate to our campaign. Will you make today the day you chip in your first $47 or $75? Representing Pennsylvania with a contribution is one of the most meaningful actions you can take in the final days of this election.
_If you've saved payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately:_ 
| $
$47 >> ---
$75 >> ---
$100 >> ---
$250 >> ---
$500 >> ---
Other >> ---
Donald Trump is counting on us to lose momentum.I refuse to give him that satisfaction. And from what I know about this grassroots team, you will not either.
We are still the underdogs in this race. We are going to win, and it is going to take grassroots supporters like you joining our fight with a donation to make it happen.
That is why I lean on you a bit more on days like today, Peter.Please use this link to chip in $47 ahead of our campaign’s midnight fundraising deadline.
Your $47 donation right now -- not tomorrow, not the day after, but today -- will directly fund our work to reach and win over persuadable voters in these final three days.
This is the most consequential election of our lifetime. It would mean the world to me to see your name on our list of donors for the first time.
Kamala Harris Vice President of the United States          * * *| | DONATE --- | TAKE ACTION --- | SHOP ---  * * *This email was sent to **dpwillis67@gmail.com**. Thank you so much for being a supporter. But Peter, we don’t want to bother you. If you’d like to unsubscribe from all Harris for President emails, you can **click here**. We sincerely thank you for your help and support.
Paid for by Harris for President.

Help me keep up the pressure and stay on track to flip Wisconsin by rushing an immediate contribution of $10, $25, $50, or more right now! clean_body: Mitch McConnell is stepping down as the Republican Leader in November and it's time to build a conservative majority in the Senate that will truly fight for our values without making excuses. The best way to send principled leaders to Washington is to donate to their campaigns through the Senate Conservatives Fund. You can contribute to multiple candidates with a single online transaction, and SCF will pay all expenses and processing fees. This will save these candidates a mountain of money, so they can use your contributions to win votes rather than to pay fundraising costs. Here are the Senate candidates who need your urgent support: ✓ Bernie Moreno (OH) ✓ Eric Hovde (WI) ✓ Sam Brown (NV) ✓ Kari Lake (AZ) Please take action right now by making a split contribution to their conservative Senate campaigns. These races are neck-and-neck, so these candidates will need funding until Election Day to broadcast their message and turn out their voters. SUPPORT SENATE CONSERVATIVES RUSH $250 → RUSH $100 → RUSH $25 → THE BEST WAY TO FUND CONSERVATIVES Did you know that candidates often have to pay fundraising expenses that are over 80 percent of your contribution? It's true. When you respond to marketing emails and text messages from candidates, the candidate often gets less than 20 percent of your donation after expenses. That's why the Senate Conservatives Fund was founded – to give freedom-loving Americans an effective way to support the best Senate candidates across the nation. Please contribute to these four candidates today! We will combine your donations with those made by thousands of other patriots and transfer them directly to their campaigns. Working together, we can build a conservative Senate that will truly advance our freedom agenda. Thank you for considering this urgent request and for doing so much to help fight for America's future! ELECTION COUNTDOWN SUPPORT SENATE CONSERVATIVES DONATE NOW Change in Washington means changing the people we send there. Senate Conservatives Fund 300 Independence Ave SE Washington, DC 20003 Text SENATE to (877) 838-9388 to receive exclusive updates and invitations. Senate Conservatives Fund is a grassroots organization that promotes conservative policies and helps elect conservative candidates to the U.S. Senate.
